anya-e0401n0:5_1: Paramatthadīpanīti ettha attho duvidho padhānatthoca pariyāyatthoca. Tattha padhānattho
anya-e0401n0:5_2: paramatthonāma, padhānatthotica padavākyānaṁ mukhyattho ujukattho. Pariyāyatthopi
anya-e0401n0:6_5: Tatthajanānāma idhabodhaneyyasattā adhippetā, yesabbaññudesanaṁ sutvā catussacca
anya-e0401n0:6_7: janambujamahāsare. Tattha jātikkhettaṁ nāmadasasahassa cakkavāḷaṁ, yaṁ ekaṁ buddhakkhettanti
anya-e0401n0:6_8: vuccati. Yattha ca mahābodhisattānaṁ buddhabhāvatthāya pathamamahābhinīhārakālādīsu
anya-e0401n0:6_10: Jātikkhettemahāsareyassa ekassa saddhammaraṁsijālino mahāsūrassa udayā tasmiṁ jātikkhette
anya-e0401n0:7_1: mohatamaṁnūdati apaneti, saddhammaraṁsijālaṁ vissajjanto antaradhāpetīti mahāmohatamonudo.
anya-e0401n0:8_0: Evaṁ buddhassapaṇāmaṁ katvā attanā icchitaṁ paṇāmappayojanaṁ pariṇāmento “sañjāta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:8_2: suṭṭhujātaṁ, anamataggesaṁsāre daḷhaṁ pavattanti attho. “Tamokhandha”nti mahāmohatamokhandhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:8_4: saṅgahitāni eva. Tathā rogādayo antarāya dhammāpi tamojātikāevatamotamaparāyanotiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:9_0: Evaṁ sappayojanaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni sanidānaṁ ganthappaṭiññaṁ karonto “porāṇakehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:9_1: Tattha nidānaṁ nāma ganthappaṭiññāya āsannakāraṇaṁ. Katadhaṁpanatanti, sāratthābhimānīnaṁ
anya-e0401n0:10_0: Tattha dvīhi gāthāhi sakāraṇaṁ yācanaṁ dasseti. Puna dvīhi gāthāhi saupamaṁvipulatthataṁdasseti.
anya-e0401n0:10_1: “Tasmā”tiādinā ganthappakāra ganthaguṇehi sahaganthappaṭiññaṁ dasseti. Tattha ādigāthāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:10_3: yojanā. “Vaṇṇanā”ti porāṇaṭīkāyo vuccanti. Evañcasati kasmā abhinavaṁ vaṇṇanaṁ yācantīti.
anya-e0401n0:10_4: “Ye sāratthābhimānino, te tāhibahūhi porāṇavaṇṇanāhituṭṭhiṁ navindanti. Tasmā taṁ
anya-e0401n0:10_5: yācantī”tiyojanā. Etena appasāratthā eva tāporāṇavaṇṇanāyotipi dīpetiyeva. Tattha
anya-e0401n0:11_0: Sāratthameva abhimānenti, visesena nandantisīlenāti sāratthābhimānino. Tenavindantītipurimenasambandho.
anya-e0401n0:11_1: Puna “te”ti tāhi tuṭṭhiṁ avindantā tejanā. “Ma”nti attānaṁ niddisati. “Saṅgammā”ti
anya-e0401n0:11_2: samāgantvā. Yasmā paramatthassadīpanaṁ yācanti, tasmā imissāṭīkāya “paramatthadīpanī”ti
anya-e0401n0:11_5: tattakaṁvīti adhippāyo. “Dajjeyyuṁ”ti dadeyyuṁ. Kāmaṁ dadantūti attho. Eyyādivacanānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:11_7: Kasmā, aparimāṇa ratanādhiṭṭhānattā mahāsamuddassa. Yato so sāgaroti vuccati, sānaṁdhanaratanānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:12_2: kāmaṁvaṇṇentu. “Pariyādinnā”ti parito anavasesato ādinnā gahitā. Parikkhīṇāti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n0:12_3: hoti. “Nahessare”ti nahessanti nabhavissanti. “Tasmā”ti yasmāca yācanti, yasmāca
anya-e0401n0:12_7: nātisaṅkhepaṁnātivitthārañca. Mandā buddhi yesaṁ te mandabuddhino. “Mandā”ti mudukā.
anya-e0401n0:12_8: “Buddhī”ti ñāṇaṁ. Mandabuddhino sotujane pabodheti vikāseti, ñāṇa vikāsaṁpāpetīti
anya-e0401n0:12_10: yojanā. Paṭunobhāvopāṭavaṁ. Paṭunoti byattassapaṇḍitassa. Pāṭavena attho yesaṁ te
anya-e0401n0:12_11: pāṭavatthino. Itisaddo parisamāpanajotako. So hi ganthārabbhavidhānassa idhaparisamāpanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:12_12: pariniṭṭhānaṁ ñāpetuṁ ganthārabbhavākyassapariyante yojito. Avayava vākyānaṁ piyojīyatiyeva. Esanayosabbattha.
anya-e0401n0:14_0: 1. Evaṁ ganthārabbhavidhānaṁ katvā idāni ādigāthāya sambandhaṁ dassento “abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:14_1: Sambandhanti kāraṇapphalasaṁyogaṁ. Tattha gāthāpavattanaṁ kāraṇaṁ nāma. Pañcapiṇḍattha
anya-e0401n0:14_2: dassanaṁ phalaṁ nāma. Kāraṇapphalasaṁyogo sambandhonāma. “Sappayojane”ti phalappayojanasahite.
anya-e0401n0:14_3: Ganthena abhidhātabbo kathetabboti ganthābhidheyyo. Nipatassa kammaṁ nipaccaṁ. Nipacca
anya-e0401n0:14_4: kiriyā, nipaccākāro, nipaccakārassakaraṇanti samāso. “Sā”ti ratanattayavandanā. Dassitātisambandho.
anya-e0401n0:14_6: adhippāyo. Duvidhohi atthovacanattho ca abhidhānatthoca. Tattha gacchatīti gato,
anya-e0401n0:14_7: purisoti vuttegacchati padena vutto yokoci gacchanto vacanatthonāma. Purisoti padenadassito
anya-e0401n0:16: Cittaṁ cetasikaṁ rūpaṁ, nibbānamiti sabbathā. ti
anya-e0401n0:17_0: Evaṁ vuttā abhidhammatthā. Evaṁ vuttattāyevaca tecattāro abhidhammatthā eva idhapadhānatthabhūtāti
anya-e0401n0:17_1: ca, - padhānatthāeva idhaganthābhidheyya bhāvena adhippetāti caviññāyatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:18_0: Kecipanavadeyyuṁ, teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṁ pattā visuṁ saṅgahatthānāmabhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0401n0:18_1: naabhidhammatthā nāma. Idha ca saṅgahatthā eva abhidheyyabhāvena adhippetāti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n0:18_2: abhidheyyo abhidhammattha saṅgahappadenāti. Vuccate. Teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:18_3: pattāpi abhidhammatthā evanāma honti, na visuṁ saṅgahatthānāma. Tattha vuttābhidhammatthātihi
anya-e0401n0:18_4: vuttaṁ, natuvuttaṁ tattha vuttāsaṅgahatthāti. Evañcasati saṅgahitabhāvamattaṁ visiṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:18_5: hoti. Tadeva idha abhidheyyo nāma siyāti vuttaṁ “saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyo yevā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:18_7: saṅgahitehi dhammehi aññā nahoti. Tesvevadhammesusaṅgayhatīti vuttaṁ “saṅgahitabhāvopi
anya-e0401n0:18_8: abhidheyyo yevā”ti. Kiñcāpitehi aññānahoti, te sveva saṅgayhati. Sāpana ganthassapadhānattho
anya-e0401n0:18_9: nahoti. Idha ca padhānatthova adhippetoti vuttaṁ “taṁnasundara”nti. Kasmā nasundaranti
anya-e0401n0:18_10: āha “nahiso”tiādiṁ. Etthacahisaddo imassa vākyassahetuvākyabhāvaṁ joteti. Esanayoparatthapi.
anya-e0401n0:18_13: katāparamatthamañjūsānāmaṭīkā. Sā brammaraṭṭhe tiriyapabbatavāsinā therenakataṁ cūḷaṭīkaṁ
anya-e0401n0:19_0: Ganthappakāroca pakāravantehi dhammehi sahevasijjhati, vinā nasijjhatīti adhippāyena
anya-e0401n0:19_1: “soabhidhammatthapadenā”ti vuttaṁ. Kāmañca so tehi sahevasijjhati, vinānasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:19_2: Abhidhammatthapadaṁ pana saṅgahaṇakiriyāpakāraṁna vadatīti vuttaṁ “taṁ nasundara”nti.
anya-e0401n0:19_3: Duvidhaṁ nāmaṁ anvatthanāmaṁ ruḷināmanti. Tattha, atthānugataṁ nāmaṁ anvatthanāmaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:19_4: yathā sukhitassajanassa sukhotināmaṁ. Attharahitaṁ āropitaṁ nāmaṁ ruḷināmaṁ, yathā
anya-e0401n0:19_5: dukkhitassajanassa sukhoti nāmaṁ. Idha pana anvatthanā mantidassetuṁ “atthānugatā”tiādi
anya-e0401n0:19_7: hoti. “Ganthasamaññā”ti ganthasammuti. Ganthassanāmanti vuttaṁ hoti. Saṅgahaganthonāma
anya-e0401n0:19_8: pāḷiyaṁtattha tattha vippakiṇṇedhamme ekattha sabhāgarāsikaraṇavasena pavatto gantho.
anya-e0401n0:19_10: tassauggahoca paripucchācāti dvando. Ādisaddena dhāraṇādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha pāṭhassavācuggatakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:19_11: uggahonāma. Uggahi tassapāṭhassa atthaggahaṇaṁ paripucchānāma. “Anāyāsato”ti niddukkhena.
anya-e0401n0:19_13: lakkhaṇāvabodho rasāva bodhotiādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti. Anupādāparinibbānaṁ anto pariyosānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:19_17: Payojetīti “payojanaṁ”. Payojetīti niyojeti. Kiṁ niyojeti. Phalatthikaṁjanaṁ. Kattha
anya-e0401n0:19_18: niyojeti. Phalanibbattakekamme. Kimatthāya niyojeti. Tassakammassa karaṇatthāyāti.
anya-e0401n0:19_21: phalaṁpidīpeti. Phalavacanaṁ kāraṇaṁpidīpeti. Yathātaṁ asukasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo
anya-e0401n0:19_22: vuṭṭhoti vutte taṁ raṭṭhaṁsu bhikkhanti viññāyati. Asukaraṭṭhaṁ subhikkhantivutte
anya-e0401n0:19_23: tasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti viññāyatīti. Payojanaṁ pana abhidhammattha saddena
anya-e0401n0:19_24: dassetabbaṁ natthi, saṅgahavacanasāmatthiyeneva siddhaṁ hotīti adhippāyena “saṅgahasaddenā”ti
anya-e0401n0:19_25: vuttaṁ. Sāmatthiyadassane pana suṭṭhu paripuṇṇavacanaṁ icchitabbaṁ hoti. Itarathā
anya-e0401n0:19_26: aniṭṭhatthappasaṅgopi siyāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “taṁ na sundara”nti vatvā “nahī”tiādinā
anya-e0401n0:20_0: 2. Evaṁ sappayojane pañcapiṇḍattheti ettha pañcapiṇḍatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṁpañcannaṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_2: piṇḍatthesu. Nasaṅkhyātabbanti asaṅkhyeyyaṁ. Saṅkhātuṁasakkuṇeyyanti attho. Napametabbanti
anya-e0401n0:20_3: appameyyaṁ. Pametuṁ asakkuṇeyyanti attho. Evaṁ kiccapaccayānaṁ katthaci sakkattha
anya-e0401n0:20_4: dīpanaṁ hoti. Sakavacanaṁ pāḷivacanena sādhetuṁ “yathāhā”ti pucchitvā pāḷigāthaṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_5: āhari. Tattha “yathāhā”ti kathaṁ āha iccevattho. Anantare vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_6: vacanaṁ kathaṁ pāḷiyaṁ āha, kathaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ āha, kathaṁ ṭīkāyaṁ āhāti evaṁ yathārahaṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_7: attho veditabbo. “Tetādisenibbute akutobhaye pūjayato”ti yojanā. Tattha “te”ti buddha
anya-e0401n0:20_8: buddha sāvake. “Tādise”ti tathā rūpesī lakkhandhādiguṇa sampanne. “Nibbute”ti kilesa
anya-e0401n0:20_9: nibbānena nibbute. Natthi kutoci hetuto bhayaṁ yesaṁ te akuto bhayā. Anāgāmi khīṇāsavā.
anya-e0401n0:20_13: saṅgahetvā abhinava aṭṭhakathāyo karonti. Tasmā sabbāabhinavaaṭṭhakathāyo saṅgahā
anya-e0401n0:20_14: nāma honti. Te ca ācariyā saṅgahakārā nāma. Tena vuttaṁ “saṅgahakārāti buddhaghosa.
anya-e0401n0:20_15: Pe… vuccantī”ti. Te antarāya nīvāraṇameva icchantīti kathaṁ viññāyatīti ce. Tesaṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_16: vacanena viññāyatīti dassetuṁ saṅgahakāra gāthaṁ āhari. “Ratanattayekatassa etassanipaccakārassa
anya-e0401n0:20_17: ānubhāvena antarāye asesatososetvāti yojanā. “Hī”ti ñāpakahetu jotako. “Vutta”nti
anya-e0401n0:21_0: 3. “Kathañcahotī”ti sambandho. Iti ayaṁ pucchā. “Vuccate”ti visajjanā kathīyate.
anya-e0401n0:21_2: vāre”ti accanta saṁyogatthe upayoga vacanaṁ. “Puññābhisando”ti puññābhisoto, puññappavāhoti
anya-e0401n0:21_3: tasseva vevacanaṁ. “So ca puññātissayo hotī”ti sambandho. Kasmā so puññā tissayo
anya-e0401n0:21_4: hotīti. Khetta sampattiyā ca ajjhāsaya sampattiyā ca hotīti dassetuṁ “anuttaresū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:21_7: Paribhāvitassa bhāvo paribhāvitattaṁ. Ubhayatthāpi hetu atthe nissakkavacanaṁ. “Mahājutiko”ti
anya-e0401n0:21_9: mahānisaṁso. Ānisaṁsapphalanti ca paramparā phalaṁ vuccati. Aññaṁ puññaṁ atikkamanto
anya-e0401n0:21_10: sayati pavattatīti atissayo. Puññañca taṁ atissayocāti puññātissayo. Atissayapuññaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:21_11: adhika puññanti attho. “So anubalaṁ deti, okāsalābhaṁ karotī”ti sambandho. Kathañca
anya-e0401n0:21_12: anubalaṁ deti, kathañca okāsalābhaṁ karotīti āha “sayaṁ payoga sampattibhāveṭhatvā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_13: Tattha payogasampattināma atīta puññakammānaṁ balavataraṁ upatthambhakakammaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_16: kāyacittānaṁ sappāya paccayā. Cattāro paccayā ca upaṭṭhākakulāni ca ārakkha devatādayo
anya-e0401n0:21_17: ca sukhuppatti paccayā. Tehi paccayehi pāmojja bahu lassa therassa santāne rattidivaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_18: pītipassaddhisukhasamādhīnaṁ pavattiyā ajjhattabhūtā utucittāhārā ca ati paṇītā honti.
anya-e0401n0:21_19: Tehi samuṭṭhitā sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo ca atipaṇītā eva hutvā upabrūhanti. Tattha sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo
anya-e0401n0:21_22: kāleti attho. “Balavabalavantiyo hutvā”ti pakati balato atibalavantiyo hutvā. “Tasmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_24: ghanena pūrite. “Okāso nāma natthī”ti patiṭṭhānokāso nāma natthi. “Itī”ti tasmā.
anya-e0401n0:21_25: “Dūrato apanītāneva hontī”ti sambandho. Iṭṭhapphalasantānaṁ vibādhanti nīvārentīti
anya-e0401n0:21_27: akusala janaka kammāni, apuñña kammānīti tānitividhāni akusalakammāni dūrato apanītāneva
anya-e0401n0:21_28: honti, tesaṁ vipākassa anokāsakaraṇenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “nahī”tiādiṁ. “Tato”ti
anya-e0401n0:21_29: tasmā apuñña kammānaṁ dūrato apanītattā. Abhivādetabbānaṁ mātāpitu samaṇabrāhmaṇādīnaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_30: abhivādanakammegaruṁkaraṇaṁ abhivādana sīlaṁ nāma. Taṁ assa atthīti abhivādanasīlī.
anya-e0401n0:21_31: Guṇavuddhavayavuddhe apaceti attānaṁ nīcavutti karaṇena pūjetisīlenāti vuddhāpacāyī.
anya-e0401n0:21_32: Ubhayatthāpisampadāna vacanaṁ. Evantiādini gamana vacanaṁ. Nigamanti ca niṭṭhaṅgamanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_33: Tasmātiādi laddhaguṇa vacanaṁ. Laddhaguṇoti ca taṁtaṁpasaṅga visodhanaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_34: katvā laddhovisuddho attho vuccati. Tathā vacana sāmatthiyena laddho atthantaropi
anya-e0401n0:21_35: ayamidha adhippeto. “Nakevalañca therasseva anantarāyena parisamāpanatthaṁ hotī”ti
anya-e0401n0:21_36: yojanā. “Sotūnañcagahaṇa kicca sampajjanattha”ntisambandho. Suṇantīti sotāro. Tesaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_38: Javanavinicchaye yasmā antarāya nīvāraṇaṁnāma diṭṭhadhamme icchitabbaṁ phalaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_39: Diṭṭha dhammo ca pathama javanassa vipākakkhettaṁ. Tasmā upatthambhana kiccaṁ patvāpi
anya-e0401n0:21_40: pathama javana cetanā eva idhapariyattāti adhippāyena “diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā”ti
anya-e0401n0:21_41: vuttaṁ. Sā pana pathama javana cetanā upatthambhana kiccaṁ patvāpi sabbadubbalā evasiyā.
anya-e0401n0:21_42: Kasmā, aladdhāsevanattā. Sesa cetanāyo eva balavatiyo siyuṁ. Kasmā, laddhā sevanattāti
anya-e0401n0:21_43: daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Sattajavanapakkhe adhippetattā upaladdhabbattā taṁ nasundara”nti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:21_44: “Itī”ti vākyaparisamāpanaṁ. “Yathā appamattakaṁ hoti. Evamevaṁ appamattakaṁ hotī”ti
anya-e0401n0:21_45: yojetabbaṁ. “Tathāhī”ti tato evāti attho. Paṭṭhānepi=kabaḷīkāroāhāro imassakāyassa
anya-e0401n0:21_47: rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo’ti vibhatto siyāti. “Adhunāvā”ti imasmiṁ bhave eva.
anya-e0401n0:21_48: Evaṁ vandanāyapayojanaṁ dīpetvā idāni sesānaṁ piṇḍatthānaṁ payojanaṁ dīpetuṁ “yasmāpanā”tiādi
anya-e0401n0:21_50: sutvā viññātesati, “ussāhojāyati”. Imaṁ uggahetvā sudullabhe abhidhammatthe ca anāyāsena
anya-e0401n0:21_51: jānissāma, tammūlakassa ca anupādā parinibbānantassa payojanassabhāgino bhavissāmāti
anya-e0401n0:23_0: 4. Padatthe. “Bujjhī”ti aññāsi. “Etthā”ti etasmiṁ pade. Ca saddo vākyārambha jotako.
anya-e0401n0:23_1: Vākyā rambhoti ca mūlavākye yaṁ yaṁ vattabbaṁ avuttaṁ, tassa tassa kathanatthāya
anya-e0401n0:23_3: sammāsaddo asesa byāpanaṁ dīpetīti pucchāya purimatthame vabyatirekato ca anvayato
anya-e0401n0:23_4: ca puna vitthārento “tathāhī”tiādimāha. Tattha, “tathāhī”ti tassa vacanassa ayaṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_5: vitthāroti joteti. “Aviparīta”nti kiriyāvisesana padametaṁ. “Attano visaye evā”ti
anya-e0401n0:23_6: attano ñāṇavisaye eva tesaṁ visayocāti sambandho. Yasmā ekopi dhammo kāladesasantānādibhedena
anya-e0401n0:23_7: ananta bhedo hoti. Tasmā padesañāṇikā paccekabuddhādayo ekadhammaṁpi sabbākārato
anya-e0401n0:23_8: jānituṁ na sakkonti. Tenāha “tehī”tiādiṁ. Tattha “sabbākārato”ti sabhāvato, hetuto,
anya-e0401n0:23_9: paccayato, phalato, nissandato, kālato, desatotiādinā ākārena. “Yatthā”ti yasmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_10: avisayedhamme. “Te viparītaṁ bujjheyyuṁ, so avisayo nāmadhammonatthī”tiyojanā. Taṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_13: dhammā”tiādi pāḷisādhakaṁ. Tattha, “āpāta”nti abhimukhaṁ patanaṁ. Ābādhantipi pāṭho,
anya-e0401n0:23_15: pacchimabhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavattaṁ aṭṭhasu mahāvipākesu pathamamahāvipākaṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_16: bhavaṅga cittaṁ. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṁ mahābhavaṅge. “Niccakālaṁ upaṭṭhahantī”ti sabbakālaṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_17: upaṭṭhānākāra pattā hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā, kassaci āvaraṇassa abhāvato. Idaṁpihi
anya-e0401n0:23_18: ekaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ nāmāti. “Āvajjanāyā”ti manodvārāvajjana cittena. Dhammā mahantā.
anya-e0401n0:23_19: Bhavaṅgaṁ parittakaṁ. Tasmā parittakaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ ekakkhaṇe mahantānaṁ dhammānaṁ napahotīti
anya-e0401n0:23_21: ettha “ukkaṁso”ti accuggamo accuttaro. Paramo ukkaṁso paramukkaṁsotiviggaho.
anya-e0401n0:24_0: Evaṁ sammāsaddassa atthaṁ vicāretvā idāni saṁsaddassa atthaṁ vicārento “saṁsaddopanā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:24_2: Natthi ācariyo etassāti anācariyo. Samāsante kakārena saha anācariyako. Anācariyakassa
anya-e0401n0:24_3: bhāvo anācariyakatā. Taṁ anācariyakataṁ. Tatīyā ruppasamāpatti nāma ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:24_4: Taṁ bhagavā āḷārassa santike uggaṇhāti. Catutthāruppasamāpatti nāma nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanajjhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:24_6: analaṅkaritvā. Anāsevitvāti vuttaṁ hoti. “Chaḍḍitattā”ti etāsamāpattiyonālaṁ bodhāya,
anya-e0401n0:24_7: atha kho yāvadeva tatīya catutthāruppabhavappaṭilābhāya saṁvattantīti evaṁ ādīnavaṁ
anya-e0401n0:24_9: tā kuto paṭivedhadhammā honti. Paṭivedhadhammā eva ca buddhabhāvāyapadaṭṭhānāhontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:25_0: Pāḷiyaṁ. “Pubbe ananussutesudhammesū”ti imasmiṁ bhave ito pubbe kassacisantike ananussute
anya-e0401n0:25_2: vuttaṁ. Tadeva ñāṇaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṁ hoti. Tappaccayā tadanantarā
anya-e0401n0:25_3: evasabbaññutaññāṇaṁ pātubbhavatīti vuttaṁ “tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇātī”ti. “Tadanantarā”ti
anya-e0401n0:25_4: ca arahatta maggavīthiyāca catunnaṁ paccavekkhana vārānañca anantare kāleti attho.
anya-e0401n0:25_6: Tāsu hi paccattavacanaṁ, upayogavacanaṁ, karaṇa vacanaṁ, sampadāna vacanaṁ, nissakkavacanaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:25_7: sāmivacanaṁ, summavacananti evaṁ anukkamena sattannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ nāmāni āgatānīti.
anya-e0401n0:26_1: attano vasaṁ vattetuṁ samatthatā saṅkhātosatti viseso vasonāma. Vaso etassa atthīti
anya-e0401n0:26_2: vasī-vasigaṇehītiādīsuviya. Vasino bhāvo vasibhāvo. Taṁ vasibhāvanti attho. Tenāha
anya-e0401n0:28_1: iti tasmā dutīyena atulapadena kiṁ payojanaṁ atthīti attho. “Nana samatthā”ti nasamatthā
anya-e0401n0:28_2: na hotīti yojanā. Samatthā evāti adhippāyo. “Mattakārino”ti pamāṇakārino. “Thero
anya-e0401n0:28_3: ca tesaṁ aññataro”, tasmā mattaṁ na karoti, dutīyaṁ atula padaṁ āharīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:28_4: “Apicā”ti kiñci vattabbaṁ atthīti attho. “Nakevalaṁ vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇameva
anya-e0401n0:28_5: icchi tabbaṁ hotī”ti yojanā. “Vandanāyā”ti vandanāhetu. Sopi paññāpāṭavādi attho.
anya-e0401n0:28_6: “Ganthapārisuddhiyā”ti ganthadosānāma padadosa vākyadosa atthadosādayo atthi. Tehi
anya-e0401n0:28_7: dosehi imassa ganthassa pārisuddhiyā. Kathaṁ pana vandanāya paññāpāṭavādi atthosambhavatīti
anya-e0401n0:28_8: vuttaṁ “anussatiṭṭhānesū”tiādi. Anussatiṭṭhānāni nāma buddha dhamma saṅghasīlādīni.
anya-e0401n0:28_10: attha byañjana padesu amandā vissaṭṭhā hutvā vahati. “Tadatthāyapī”ti paññāpāṭavādi
anya-e0401n0:28_11: atthāyapi. Guṇanāmapadānaṁ guṇatthonāmaviggaha vākyesu pākaṭo, siddhapadesu apākaṭo.
anya-e0401n0:28_12: Tasmā tāni viggahatthaṁ ajānantānaṁ santike nāma mattāni sampajjantīti vuttaṁ “yathāvutta
anya-e0401n0:28_14: jānantānaṁ. Māgadhabhāsāhi mūlabhāsāti ca ariyabhāsāti ca māgadhabhāsāti ca pāḷibhāsāti
anya-e0401n0:28_15: ca dhammaniruttīti ca sabhāvaniruttīti ca vuccati. “Bhāvatthasuñña”nti ettha guṇanāmānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:28_16: guṇattho bhāvattho nāma. So evasakatthoti ca vacanatthoti ca viggahatthoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_18: bhavituṁ nārahati. Tathāhi anāthapiṇḍikoseṭṭhi rājagahaṁ anupatto buddho loke uppannoti
anya-e0401n0:28_19: sutvā udānaṁ udānesi=ghosopi kho esodullabho lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ buddho=ti. Tasmā buddhoti
anya-e0401n0:28_20: nāmaṁpi loke mahantaṁ sudullabhaṁguṇapadaṁ hoti. Sammāsambuddha nāmevattabbamevanatthīti.
anya-e0401n0:28_21: “Sabhāvaniruttiṁ ajānantānaṁ pana padasahassaṁ vuccamānaṁpī”ti tiṭṭhatu ekaṁ atulapadaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:28_22: padasahassaṁpi vuccamānaṁ satthusamaññāmattameva sampajjati. Tādisāhi janā idaṁ loke
anya-e0401n0:29_0: “Atulo”ti aññena so asadisoti vā, añño vātena sadisotassanatthītivā, - dvidhāpiattholabbhati.
anya-e0401n0:29_1: Sādhakagāthāyaṁ “paṭipuggalo”ti yugaggāhīpuggalo. Kiñcāpi makkhali pūraṇādayo visuṁvisuṁ
anya-e0401n0:29_2: - ahaṁ sabbaññū sabbadassāvī - tica, ahaṁ sammāsambuddho-tica paṭijānantā yugaggāhino
anya-e0401n0:29_3: hutvā vicaranti. Dhammato pana sineru pabbata rājassa santike sakkhara kathalāniviyasampajjantīti.
anya-e0401n0:29_5: bhūtassapattassa. “Yaṁ buddha bhūtassa atulattaṁ, etaṁ anacchariya”nti yojanā. Yadi
anya-e0401n0:29_6: cetaṁ anacchariyaṁ hoti, katamaṁ pana tāva acchariyaṁ bhavatīti āha “sampatijātassā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_7: Tattha “sampatijātassā”ti ajjevajātassapi assa bhagavato. Kathaṁ atulatā paññāyatīti
anya-e0401n0:29_9: atimahanto obhāso pātubbhavati. = Uḷāro obhāso pāturahosi atikkammadevānaṁ devānubhāva=ntihi
anya-e0401n0:29_10: vuttaṁ. Tena obhāsena pharitā sabbe pathavi pabbatādayo jātiphalikakkhandhāviya suppasannā
anya-e0401n0:29_11: honti. Dasasahassa cakkavāḷāni ekatalaṁ hutvā paññāyanti. Tena vuttaṁ “anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni
anya-e0401n0:29_13: sattalokato. Evaṁ acchambhi vācaṁ nicchāresi dhammatāya sañcoditattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:29_14: Tattha “acchambhivāca”nti visāradavācaṁ. Āsabhiṁ vācantipi pāṭho. Uttamavācanti attho.
anya-e0401n0:29_15: “Nicchāresī”ti udāharati. Idampi anacchariyaṁ, aññaṁ pitato acchariyataraṁ atthīti
anya-e0401n0:29_16: dassetuṁ “yadāpanā”tiādi āraddhaṁ. Pāramitā guṇehi tena sadiso kocinattheva thapetvā
anya-e0401n0:29_17: aññe ca mahābodhi satteti adhippāyo. “Assā”ti tena sadisassa. “Natthibhāvo dīpetabbo”ti
anya-e0401n0:29_19: satasahassaṁ sakkhissatī”ti yojanā. Pāramiyo pakārenavicinanti etenāti pāramipavicayo.
anya-e0401n0:29_20: Ñāṇaṁ. Taṁpanañāṇaṁ mahābodhisattānaṁ eva uppannaṁ nahoti. Paccekabodhisatta sāvakabodhisattānaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:29_21: uppannameva. Tadeva ca sabbesaṁpi bodhisattānaṁ niyatabyākaraṇappaṭilābhe padhānakāraṇanti
anya-e0401n0:29_23: nāmaṁ. Bodhimhisajanti laggantīti bodhisattā. “Laggantī”ti tappaṭilābhatthāya niyata
anya-e0401n0:29_24: cittā hontīti attho. Bodhi atthāya paṭipannā sattā bodhisattātipi yujjati. Buddha
anya-e0401n0:29_25: suññepiloke kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mokkhadhammapariyesino sattāti
anya-e0401n0:29_26: vuttaṁ hoti. “Sambhāra dhamme”ti dasavidhe pārami dhamme. Vaṭṭaṁ anusaranti anugacchantīti
anya-e0401n0:29_27: vaṭṭānusārino. Pathaviyaṁ paṁsucuṇṇāni viya pakatiyā vaputhubhūtājanāti puthujjanā.
anya-e0401n0:29_28: Mahantāputhujjanāti mahāputhujjanā. Vaṭṭānusārino ca te mahāputhujjanācāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:29_29: Tesaṁ bhāvoti viggaho. Ayaṁ bhāvoyeva tesaṁ bhūmīti ca vuccati. Atthato pana mokkhadhammanirapekkhatā
anya-e0401n0:29_30: eva. Acchandikatātipi vuccati. “Okkantā”ti paviṭṭhā. Tayoniyatā, bodhisattaniyato
anya-e0401n0:29_31: ca cūḷasotāpannaniyato ca ariya sotāpannaniyato ca. Tattha bodhisattaniyato bodhisambhārabalena
anya-e0401n0:29_32: siddho. Cūḷasotāpanna niyato paccayākārānubodhaññāṇabalena. Ariyasotāpanna niyato
anya-e0401n0:29_33: sotāpatti maggaññāṇa balena. Tesu bodhisattaniyato idha adhippetoti vuttaṁ “ekena
anya-e0401n0:29_34: pariyāyenā”tiādi. Vattabbamevanatthitesaṁ dvinnaṁ bodhisattānaṁ pārami pavicayaññāṇa
anya-e0401n0:29_35: sampattiyā vinā niyatabyākaraṇa lābhā saṅkāya eva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:30_0: Padasiddhivicāreyaṁ vuttaṁ vibhāvaniyaṁ=tulāyasamitotulyo. Tulyo eva tuloyakāra lopavasenā=ti.
anya-e0401n0:30_3: Tattha “tulāyā”ti loke dhāraṇatulāsadisāya paññāyāti attho. “Samīto”ti samaṁ kato.
anya-e0401n0:30_4: Nahi tulasaddo bhavituṁ nayutto. Yutto evāti adhippāyo. Kathaṁ viññāyatīti āha “tulayitu”ntiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:30_6: pubbe-tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tuloti evaṁ idhavuttena kamma sādhana vacanattheneva.
anya-e0401n0:30_7: “Tadatthasiddhito”ti tassa vibhāvaniyaṁ vuttassa duvidhassa atthassa siddhito. “Tato”ti
anya-e0401n0:30_8: tulasaddato. Cintāya kiṁ payojanaṁ atthi. Natthiyevāti adhippāyo. Vadati sīlenāti
anya-e0401n0:30_9: vattā. Vādī puggalo. Vattuno icchāvatticchā. Vattuṁ icchāvatticchātipivadanti. Vatticchaṁ
anya-e0401n0:30_10: anugato sammuti saṅketavohāra siddhattāti samāso. “Eta”nti etaṁ dvidhāsiddhavacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:30_11: “Ce”ti cevadeyya. “Nā”ti nayuttaṁ. “Yathāsuta”nti tula iti sutaṁ. “Yutta”nti yathāsuta
anya-e0401n0:30_13: Tatoyevayakāra yuttassatulyasaddassa ca assutassa. Itthiliṅgesati, tatopi eko akāroti
anya-e0401n0:30_14: katvā samītatthe dutīyo taddhita akāropi assutoyevanāmahoti. “Parikappanāyā”ti parikappetvā
anya-e0401n0:31_0: 6. Evaṁ dvinnaṁ padānaṁ padattha saṁvaṇṇanaṁ katvā idāni tesaṁyeva atthuddhārasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_2: nāma” samatiṁ sapāramīnaṁ paripūraṇaṁ. “Mahāvajiraññāṇa”nti bhagavato āsavakkhayaññāṇampi
anya-e0401n0:31_3: vuccati. Tassa pubbabhāge buddhabhāvatthāya anupadadhammavipassanāvasena chattiṁsa
anya-e0401n0:31_4: koṭi satasahassa saṅkhānaṁ devasikaṁ vaḷañjanakapphalasamāpattīnaṁ pubbabhāga vipassanāñāṇampi
anya-e0401n0:31_5: mahāvajiraññāṇanti vuccati. Sabbampetaṁ mahāṭīkāyaṁ vuttaṁ. “Mahābodhiyā”ti sabbaññu
anya-e0401n0:31_6: buddhānaṁ abhisambodhi saṅkhātassa aggamaggaññāṇassa. Pahiyyanti pahātabbā dhammā
anya-e0401n0:31_7: etenāti pahānaṁ. Pajahanti pahātabbedhammeetenātivā pahānanti katvā taṁ aggamaggaññāṇampitaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_8: vipassanāñāṇampi pahānanti vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena “pahānasampadāyaṁ vā sā saṅgahitā”ti
anya-e0401n0:31_9: vuttaṁ. Pañcasīlāni. Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁsīlaṁ, veramaṇisīlaṁ, cetasikaṁsīlaṁ, saṁvarosīlaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:31_10: avītikkamosilantiādīsuviya etthahi pahānasīlaṁ nāma yathā vuttena atthena veramaṇisīlamevāti
anya-e0401n0:31_11: yujjati. Pahānaṁ nāma kocidhammo nahotīti adhippāye pana satipahāna sīsena pahānasādhakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_12: tadevañāṇadvayaṁ upacārenapahānanti gahetabbaṁ. Itarathā pahānasampadā nāma asārā
anya-e0401n0:31_13: aphalāti āpajjeyyāti. Paccekabuddha buddhasāvakā kilese pajahantāpi vāsanāya saha
anya-e0401n0:31_14: appajahanato citta santāne mohavāsanāya vijjamānattā sabbaññu bhāvaṁ nagacchanti.
anya-e0401n0:31_15: Tasmā yathātesaṁ kilesappahānaṁ pahānasampadā nāma nahoti. Natathāsabbaññubuddhānanti
anya-e0401n0:31_16: āha “sahavāsanāyā”tiādiṁ. Vibhāvaniyaṁñāṇasampadā pathamaṁ vuttā. Tato pahāna sampadā.
anya-e0401n0:31_17: Ṭīkāyaṁ pana pahānasampadā pathamaṁ vuttā. Tato adhigama sampadānāma vuttā. Tato
anya-e0401n0:31_18: ñāṇasampadā. Pahānasampadāyañca aggamaggaññāṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Adhigama sampadāti ca sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābho
anya-e0401n0:31_21: sabbaññutaññāṇassapadaṭṭhānaṁ, āsanna kāraṇaṁ. “Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma
anya-e0401n0:31_22: atthi”. Paramatthato natthīti adhippāyo. Idañca visuddhimagge=pahānanti koci dhammonāma
anya-e0401n0:31_23: natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṁ pāṇātipātādīnaṁ anuppādamattato=ti āgatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_24: Pahāyakadhammasamādānena pana pahātabba dhammānaṁ anuppādo nāma ekopaṇīta dhammohoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_25: Ekaṁ santi padaṁ hoti. Tathāhi vuttaṁ paṭisambhidā magge=uppādo bhayaṁ, anuppādo
anya-e0401n0:31_26: khemanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Pavatti bhayaṁ, appavatti khemanti santipadeñāṇa=nti. Tadaṅgappahānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_27: panatadaṅgaanuppādo nāma. Vikkhambhanappahānaṁ vikkhambhana anuppādo nāma. Samucchedappahānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_28: samuccheda anuppādo nāmāti vattabbaṁ. Idha pana anuppāda sampāpakaṁ vipassanā ñāṇañca
anya-e0401n0:31_29: maggaññāṇañca upacārena pahānanti adhippetaṁ. Kasmā, upariñāṇa sampadādīnaṁ paccayattāti
anya-e0401n0:31_31: āgataṁ. “Sīlādiguṇehī”ti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiññāṇadassana guṇehi. “Iddhidhammehī”ti
anya-e0401n0:31_33: mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asīti khuddakalakkhaṇehi ca paṭimaṇḍitassa. “Āsayo”ti citta
anya-e0401n0:31_37: dvepahāna sampadā ñāṇasampadā. Sammāsambuddhapade. “Sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhī”ti
anya-e0401n0:31_38: ettha abhisambodhisaṅkhātaṁ aggamaggaññāṇaṁ gahitaṁ. Tañca pahānakiccappadhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_39: “Tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ patto”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ. “Balesu ca vasibhāva”nti
anya-e0401n0:31_40: ettha dasabalaññāṇāni gahitāni. Tena vuttaṁ “dve…pe… sammāsambuddhapadenavibhāvitā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:33_1: samavāyatthattā ahaṁlokanāyakañca saṅghañca namassissanti evaṁ samavāyattho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:33_2: Tathā idhapi sammāsambuddhañcasaddhammañca gaṇuttamañca abhivādiyāmīti evaṁ kiriyāsamavāyattho
anya-e0401n0:33_3: sahasaddena dīpitoti dassetuṁ “dūratohaṁ…pe… evamidaṁ daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṁ. “Ida”nti
anya-e0401n0:33_4: sasaddhammagaṇuttamapadaṁ. Ettha ca“samavāyo”ti dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ bahūnaṁ vā atthānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:33_5: ekasmiṁ dabbevā guṇevākiriyāyavāsamaṁ avecca ayanaṁpavattanaṁ samavāyo. Paccānutāpa
anya-e0401n0:33_6: paccānumodanādiṭhānesu=ahaṁ pubbedānaṁ nadadissaṁ, sīlaṁ narakkhissaṁ. - Anekajāti
anya-e0401n0:33_7: saṁsāraṁ sandhāvissa=ntiādinā atītepikāle anāgatavacanaṁ payujjatīti āha “namassissa”nti
anya-e0401n0:33_9: Abbhūta tabbhāvecāyaṁ īkāro. Yathā, kāko setī bhavati, bako kaṇhībhavatīti. Ettha
anya-e0401n0:33_10: ca “setī bhavatī”ti asetapubbo setobhavati. “Kaṇhībhavatī”ti akaṇhapubbo kaṇhobhavatīti
anya-e0401n0:33_11: attho. Tathā idhapi. Buddhaṁ dhammañca saṅghañcavanditvā-tiādīsu visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā
anya-e0401n0:33_12: aguṇabhūtāpi dhammasaṅghā idhasamāsapade aññapadatthassaguṇabhūtāhonti. Ayaṁ abbhūtatabbhāvattho
anya-e0401n0:33_13: nāma. “Abhivāditabhāvo”ti vutte tapaccayassa bahulaṁ atītakālavisayattā pubbeganthārambhakāle
anya-e0401n0:33_14: dhamma saṅghānaṁpi therassa vandanāsiddhi dassitā hoti. “Abhivādetabba bhāvo”ti vuttepana
anya-e0401n0:33_15: tabbapaccayassakālasāmaññavisayattāna tathā dassitā hoti. Dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, sīlaṁ rakkhitabbantiādīsu
anya-e0401n0:33_16: viya dhammasaṅghānāmasabbakālaṁpi abhivādetabbāti. Evaṁ dhammasaṅghānaṁ sabbakālaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:33_17: abhivādanārahaguṇo eva dassitoti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:33_18: “abhivādana”nti idaṁ kiriyāsamavāyadassanato vuttaṁ. Kālavisesaṁ pana nadīpetiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:33_19: “Attano nidassanenā”ti saputtadāro āgatoti attanā nīharitvā dassitena payogena. Sohi
anya-e0401n0:33_20: payogo kiriyā samavāyasseva. Naguṇasamavāyassāti. Ettha ca therassa vandanāvacane
anya-e0401n0:33_21: thero imehi yevapadehi ratanattayaṁtīhidvāre hivandatīti gahetvā “abhivādiyā”ti ettha
anya-e0401n0:33_22: abhivādiyādhīti ca atthaṁ nīharanti. Appadhāna kiriyāpade pana tadattha nīharaṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:33_23: asambhāvento “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha “apicā”ti kiñci vattabbaṁ atthīti atthajotane
anya-e0401n0:34_0: Vacanatthe. Sadhano puriso, dhanavāpuriso-ti ādayo samāsataddhitasaddā yebhūyyena
anya-e0401n0:34_1: atissayattha dīpakā honti. Nahi appakena dhanena tathā voharanti. Tasmā idhāpi tathā
anya-e0401n0:34_2: rūpaṁ atissayatthaṁ dassetuṁ “attanānimmitena…pe… saraṇabhūtenā”ti vuttaṁ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:34_5: gaṇuttamanti thomanaṁ. “Idaṁpī”ti dutīyattha sampiṇḍane ayaṁpikāro. Nakevalaṁ purimapadadvayameva
anya-e0401n0:34_6: satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadaṁ hoti. Atha kho idaṁpi padaṁ satthu paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇa
anya-e0401n0:35_2: dhammo nāmā”ti kasmā vuttaṁ, nanu nissaraṇappahānameva nibbānassa kiccaṁ, idañca
anya-e0401n0:35_4: hutvā”ti ārammaṇādhipatibhūtaṁ ārammaṇū panissayabhūtañca nibbānaṁ attano patiṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_5: katvāti adhippāyo. Apica, samucchedoti ca nissaraṇanti ca atthato samānagatikaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:35_6: Tasmā nissaraṇaṁpi mukhyadhāraṇa mevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Nissaraṇamevavā padhānadhāraṇanti
anya-e0401n0:35_8: “Etepañca pariyāyadhammāyeva”. Kasmā, nibbānassaviyamaggānaṁ samuccheda kicce asahāyattāti.
anya-e0401n0:35_9: Ettha ca “sāmaññapphalānī”ti samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṁ. Ariyamaggassetaṁ nāmaṁ. Sāmaññassaphalaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_10: sāmaññapphalaṁ. Dutīyavikappe akicca paccayabhūtāpi kecikitakapaccayā kammatthegatā
anya-e0401n0:35_11: kiccapaccayānaṁpi atthaṁ dīpeti. Yathā, diṭṭhaṁ, sutaṁ, mutaṁ, viññātanti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_13: “Kecī”ti cattāro maggā. Puna “kecī”ti nibbānameva. Bahuvacana sotepatitattā ettha
anya-e0401n0:35_14: bahuvacanaṁ ruḷaṁ. Puna “kecī”ti cattāro sāmaññapphala dhammā. “Kecī”ti pariyatti
anya-e0401n0:35_15: dhammo. Etthāpi bahuvacanaṁ sotapatitameva. “Dhārenta”nti dhārentaṁ puggalaṁ. Tatīya
anya-e0401n0:35_16: vikappe “apatamānaṁ vahantī”ti apatamānaṁ katvā vahanti. Catuttha vikappe “etthā”ti
anya-e0401n0:35_17: etasmiṁ dhamme. Dhammovadīpaṁ etesanti dhammadīpā. Dhammova paṭisaraṇaṁ etesanti
anya-e0401n0:35_18: dhammappaṭisaraṇā. Dhammadīpā bhikkhave bhavatha dhammappaṭisaraṇā, anaññappaṭisaraṇā
anya-e0401n0:35_19: tihi vuttaṁ. Laddhā patiṭṭhā etesanti laddhappatiṭṭhā. Yujjatiyeva. Dhammadīpapāṭhānulomattāti
anya-e0401n0:35_20: adhippāyo. Dhammavicāraṇāyaṁ, codakopaṭipatti dhammaṁ dasavidha dhammato aññaṁmaññamāno
anya-e0401n0:35_21: “kasmā”tiādinā codeti. So pana paṭipatti dhammo tato aññona hoti, tattheva antogadhoti
anya-e0401n0:35_23: ambapupphaambapphalassa patiṭṭhā bhāvena pubbabhāga nissayo hoti. Kasmā, itoyevatassa
anya-e0401n0:35_24: pupphapphalassa jātattā etthevasaṁ vaḍḍhitattā ca. Tathā paṭipatti dhammopi ariyamaggapphalassapatiṭṭhābhāvena
anya-e0401n0:35_25: pubbabhāgūpanissayappaṭipadāhoti. Kasmā, itoyeva tassajātattā etthevasaṁ vaḍḍhitattā
anya-e0401n0:35_26: ca. Vuttañhetaṁ mahāvagga saṁyutte. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yekeci mebījagāmabhūtagāmāvuḍḍhiṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_27: viruḷiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti. Sabbete pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviṁ patiṭṭhāya. Evameva
anya-e0401n0:35_28: kho bhikkhave bhikkhusīlaṁ nissāya sīlepatiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgīkaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento
anya-e0401n0:35_29: vuḍḍhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesūti. “Pubbacetanāviyadāne”ti yathā tividhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_30: puññaṁ, dānamayaṁ puññaṁ sīlamayaṁ puññaṁ bhāvanāmayaṁ puññanti vutte dānavatthu
anya-e0401n0:35_31: pariyesanato paṭṭhāya dānaṁ ārabbhapavattā sabbā pubbabhāga cetanā dānavacane saṅgahitā
anya-e0401n0:35_32: dānantveva saṅkhyaṁgatā. Evaṁ so paṭipatti dhammo ariya maggavacane evasaṅgahito,
anya-e0401n0:35_33: ariyamaggo tveva saṅkhyaṁ gatoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_0: Imasmiṁ dhammasaṁsandane aparampi vattabbaṁ vadanto “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha “yadaggenā”ti
anya-e0401n0:36_1: yenakāraṇakoṭṭhāsena dhāraṇūpāyotiādinā kāraṇabhāgenāti attho. Vandanaṁ araha tīti
anya-e0401n0:36_2: vandaneyyo. Tasmiṁ vandaneyye. “Puthujjanakalyāṇako”ti ettha tividho kalyāṇako vinayakalyāṇako
anya-e0401n0:36_3: suttantakalyāṇako abhidhammakalyāṇakoti. Tattha vinaye paññattāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā
anya-e0401n0:36_4: samannāgato bhikkhu vinayakalyāṇako nāma. So idha bhikkhu pātimokkha saṁvarasaṁvuto
anya-e0401n0:36_5: viharati ācāra gocara sampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati
anya-e0401n0:36_6: sikkhāpadesūti ettha veditabbo. Tattha vinaye paññattākalyāṇappaṭipattiduvidhā, ādi
anya-e0401n0:36_8: ādibrahmacariyakaṁ nāma. Khandhakapariyāpannaṁ sīlaṁ abhisamacārikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:37_0: Suttantesu vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suttanta
anya-e0401n0:37_1: kalyāṇako nāma. So catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaṁ duggatibhayaṁ
anya-e0401n0:37_2: samatikkanto hoti. Katamehi catūhi. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena
anya-e0401n0:37_3: samannāgato hoti iti piso bhagavā…pe… satthādevamanussānaṁ, buddho, bhagavāti. Dhamme
anya-e0401n0:37_4: aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo…pe… paccattaṁ veditabbo
anya-e0401n0:37_5: viññūhīti. Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_6: anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hotīti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:37_7: Tattha buddhe aveccappasādo nāma arahaṁ, sammāsambuddho, tiādikānaṁ guṇapadānaṁ attha
anya-e0401n0:37_8: jānanaññāṇena yutto pasādo. Ariyehikāmīyanti icchīyantīti ariyakantāni. Suparisuddhassa
anya-e0401n0:37_9: ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlassetaṁ nāmaṁ. Cattārimāni bhikkhave sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Katamāni cattāri.
anya-e0401n0:37_10: Sappurisasaṁsevo, saddhammassavanaṁ, yoniso manasikāro, dhammānu dhammappaṭipattītiādīni
anya-e0401n0:38_0: Abhidhamme vā suttantesu vā vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgatogahaṭṭho vā pabbajito
anya-e0401n0:38_1: vā abhidhammakalyāṇako nāma. So idha sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariya dhammassakovido
anya-e0401n0:38_2: ariyadhammesu vinīto. So rūpaṁ attato na samanupassatīti ettha veditabbo. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:38_3: “sutavā”ti ettha khandhā, yatana, dhātu, paṭiccasamuppāda, satipaṭṭhānā, dīsu uggaha
anya-e0401n0:38_4: paripucchā vinicchayaññāṇa samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suta vā nāmāti aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0401n0:38_5: vutto. So eva puthujjana kalyāṇakoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:40: Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano. ti
anya-e0401n0:41_0: Ca vuttaṁ. Aṅguttare pana catukkanipāte katamo puggalo appassuto sutena upapanno
anya-e0401n0:41_1: hoti. Idhekacco dhammaṁ suṇāti ekāyapi cātuppadikāya gāthāya attha maññāya dhamma
anya-e0401n0:41_2: maññāya dhammā nu dhammappaṭipanno hoti. Ayaṁ appassutosutena upapannoti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_3: Sutavāti ca sutena upapannoti ca atthato ekanti. Puthujjana kalyāṇako saṅghe sekkhesusaṅgahito.
anya-e0401n0:41_4: Vuttaṁhetaṁ parivāre ke sikkhantīti. Puthujjana kalyāṇakena saddhiṁ satta ariyapuggalā
anya-e0401n0:41_5: sikkhanti. Arahā khīṇāsavo sikkhitasikkhoti. Dakkhiṇa vibhaṅgasutta aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_6: pana. Ti saraṇa saraṇaṁ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahitoti
anya-e0401n0:41_7: vuttaṁ. Tattha, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannonāma sotāpatti maggaṭṭho ariyapuggalo.
anya-e0401n0:41_9: saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gacchāmīti ca, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti ca, evarūpesu
anya-e0401n0:41_10: ṭhānesu āgate saṅgha vacane asaṅgahito. “Na hitaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchantassasaraṇagamanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_11: sampajjatī”ti idaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gacchāmīti ettha saṅgha vacanetassapuggalassa asaṅgahita
anya-e0401n0:41_12: bhāvasādhanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tenāha “taṁ paṭikkhittaṁ hotī”ti. Sace pana sabbaṁ bhagavato
anya-e0401n0:41_13: sāvakasaṅghaṁ anuddhissatameva puggalaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gaccheyya āyasmantaṁ saraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_14: gacchāmīti. Saraṇa gamanaṁ na sampajjatiyeva. Atha sabbaṁ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_15: uddissa tassa santike saraṇaṁ gaccheyya saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti. Sampajjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:41_16: Idañca daharakāle sabbappathamaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Idañhi saraṇa gamanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_17: nāma sakiṁ gahetvā ratanattaye saddhaṁ ajahantassa yāvajīvaṁpi na bhijjati. Punappunaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_18: gahaṇa kiccaṁ natthi. Punappunaṁ gaṇhantepi dosonatthi. Punappunaṁ puññaṁ vaḍḍhati.
anya-e0401n0:41_19: Sabbappathamaṁ gahaṇakāle ca aññena dinnattā laddhaṁ nahoti. Attanovacī bhedena laddhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_20: hoti. Tasmā aññassa santike aggahetvā sayameva vacībhedaṁ gaṇhantassa gahaṭṭhassa
anya-e0401n0:41_21: saraṇa gamanaṁ sampajjatiyeva. Tathā sabbāni gahaṭṭhasīlānīti. Sāmaṇera saraṇa gamanampana
anya-e0401n0:41_22: bhikkhunādinnameva labbhati. Tañca kho ubhinnaṁpiṭhānakaraṇa sampattiyā sati evāti
anya-e0401n0:41_23: daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Vo”ti tumhākaṁ. Yodhammo ca desito yovinayocapaññatto. “Mamaccayenā”ti
anya-e0401n0:41_24: mamātikkamena. Mayi parinibbuteti vuttaṁ hoti. Satthā bhavissatīti pāṭhaseso. “Saṁvaṇṇito”ti
anya-e0401n0:41_27: adhippāyo. Visesato pana vinayappaṭipatti eva idha pariyattāti daṭṭhabbā. “So”ti
anya-e0401n0:41_28: sodussīlo pāpadhammo. Attanopi saraṇaṁ nahoti. Avassaṁ apāyagāmīyeva so hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:41_29: “Kuto saraṇaṁ bhavissatī”ti yojanā. “Anekesu suttasahassesū”ti vinayepi bahūni garahasuttapadāni
anya-e0401n0:42_0: Saddhammavacanatthe. Kilesesamenti vūpasamentīti santoti vacanatthaṁ sandhāya “samitakilesāna”nti
anya-e0401n0:42_1: vuttaṁ. Santa saddo pana pasattheca, pūjiteca, sappuriseca, paṇḍiteca, dissatīti
anya-e0401n0:42_3: yojanā. Etena sabhāvato atthisaṁvijjatīti santoti dasseti. “So”ti aññatitthiya dhammo.
anya-e0401n0:42_5: yebhuyyena duggati vipākattāti adhippāyo. “Ayaṁ panā”ti satthu saddhammo pana. “Tathā
anya-e0401n0:42_6: dhārentassā”ti ayaṁ me hitoti dhārentassa hitoyevasampajjati, sugati nibbāna sampāpakattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:43_1: janā gaṇīyanti etthāti gaṇo. Saṁhanīyanti ekatokarīyanti etthāti saṅghoti imamatthaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_2: dīpeti. Saha ekato dhammaṁ carantīti sahadhammikā. Ekassa satthuno dhamma vinaye
anya-e0401n0:43_3: pabbajitā. Tesaṁ sahadhammikānaṁ. Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamagaṇo nāma. Ye keci
anya-e0401n0:43_4: loke saṅghāvā gaṇāvā. Tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatīti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:43_5: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati visesana para nipāta vasenāti adhippāyo. Uttamasaddassa
anya-e0401n0:43_6: guṇanāmattā “guṇamhiyeva pavattatī”ti vuttaṁ. “Tenā”ti uttama saddena. “Gaṇoti saṅghoyeva
anya-e0401n0:43_7: vuccati” saṅghasaddassapi samūhaṭṭhe niruḷhattā, “so vinayakammesu pasiddho”ti pañcasaṅghā
anya-e0401n0:43_9: catuvaggakaraṇīyaṁ kammaṁ, pañcavaggakaraṇīyaṁ kammantiādinā pasiddho pākaṭo. Dakkhiṇā
anya-e0401n0:43_10: vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā āyatiṁ vipākapphalappaṭi lābhatthāya dinnaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_11: dānakammaṁ dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā. Taṁdakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhituṁ arahatīti
anya-e0401n0:43_12: dakkhiṇeyyo. “Arahatī”ti ca anuttara puññakkhetta visesattādāyakena icchita patthitassa
anya-e0401n0:43_13: āyatiṁ phalassa suṭṭhusampādanavasena dāyakassa ca avirādhanato asaṅkhyeyyāppameyyavaḍḍhi
anya-e0401n0:43_14: āvahanato ca paṭiggaṇhituṁ arahati. Evarūpaṁhidānaṁ nāma uḷāradānaṁ hoti. Taṁ yesudussīlesudiyyati.
anya-e0401n0:43_15: Tesaṁ khetta duṭṭhattā dāyakena icchitapatthitaṁ phalaṁ na sampādeti. Nipphalaṁ vā
anya-e0401n0:43_16: hoti. Appapphalaṁ vā. Evaṁsati, te dāyakañca virādhenti nāma. Puññapphalāni ca vināsenti
anya-e0401n0:43_17: nāma. Sayañca taṁdānaṁ paṭiggahaṇato vā paribhogato vā saddhādeyyaṁ vinipātanato
anya-e0401n0:43_18: vā duggati bhāgino honti. Tasmāte evarūpaṁ dānaṁ paṭiggaṇhituṁ nārahantīti. “Upasampadākammaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_19: sammuti nāmā”ti ekena pariyāyena sammuti kammaṁ nāma. Tañhi kāmaṁtera sasusammuti
anya-e0401n0:43_20: kammesunāgataṁ. Ñatti catuttha kammavācā saṅkhātāya pana saṅghasammutiyā siddhattā
anya-e0401n0:43_21: tena pariyāyena sammuti kammanti vuccatīti. “Upasampannabhūmiṁ patvā”ti upasampannabhūmi
anya-e0401n0:43_22: saṅkhātaṁ upariṭhānantaraṁ patvā. Tathā hi vuttaṁ vinaye bhikkhu vibhaṅge. Ñatti
anya-e0401n0:43_23: catutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahenāti. Tattha, “ṭhānārahenā”ti upasampanna bhūmisaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_24: ṭhānantaraṁ pāpetuṁ arahenāti attho. “Upasampannabhūmī”ti ca upasampanna sīlaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:43_25: “Vinayakammesu pasiddho”ti. Suṇātumebhante saṅgho tiādīsu pākaṭo. Apica “sammuti
anya-e0401n0:43_26: saṅgho”ti, devasaṅghāsamāgatātiādīsu viya bahūnaṁ samūhanaṭṭhena lokasammutiyā siddhosaṅgho
anya-e0401n0:43_27: sammuti saṅghotipi yujjati. “Ariyapuggalasamūho”ti puthujjanakalyāṇako bhikkhu pubbe
anya-e0401n0:43_28: vuttanayena sotāpatti maggaṭṭhe saṅgahitoti, tena saha aṭṭhavidho ariya puggalasamūho.
anya-e0401n0:43_29: “Sammuti saṅghe antogadhoyevā”ti etena dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma visuṁ navattabbo. Tasmiñca
anya-e0401n0:43_30: navattabbe sati, sammuti saṅghotipi vattabba kiccaṁ natthi. Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
anya-e0401n0:43_31: tveva vattabbaṁ hotīti dasseti. Saccametaṁ. Idha pana saṅghavacanena āgataṭṭhānassa
anya-e0401n0:43_32: duvidhattā saṅghassa duvidhatā vuttā. Tattha sammuti saṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṁ vinayakammesūti
anya-e0401n0:43_33: vuttameva. Idāni ariyasaṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṁ dassento “tathāpī”tiādimāha. Tattha
anya-e0401n0:43_34: saraṇa gamana…pe… anussatiṭṭhānesu upasampannabhūto bhikkhusaṅghova gahetabbo. Dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0401n0:43_35: pana puggalikadānesu catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato upāsakopi sāmaṇeropi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:43_36: Saṅghika dānesu pana bhikkhusaṅghova. “Tathā tathā saṁvaṇṇetvā”ti āhuneyyo, pāhuneyyo,
anya-e0401n0:43_37: dakkhiṇeyyo, añjalīkaraṇīyyo, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā, tiādināsuṭṭhu thometvā.
anya-e0401n0:43_38: So dakkhiṇeyya saṅgho. “Puthujjana saṅgho”ti idaṁ ariya saṅghena vinākevalaṁ puthujjanasaṅghaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_39: sandhāya vuttaṁ. Ettha ca saṅgha vacanena saṅgha pariyāpanno ekopi bhikkhu gahetabbo.
anya-e0401n0:43_40: So sace puthujjano hoti, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ nahoti. Yadi ariya puggalo hoti,
anya-e0401n0:44_0: Dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasutte saṅghikadāne bhavissanti kho panānanda gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā
anya-e0401n0:44_1: dussīlā pāpadhammā. Tesaṁpi saṅghaṁ uddissa dānaṁ dassanti. Tadāpānanda saṅghagataṁ
anya-e0401n0:44_2: dakkhiṇaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ appameyyanti vadāmīti vuttattā saṅghikaṭṭhānaṁ patvā koci
anya-e0401n0:44_3: bhikkhu dakkhiṇeyya saṅghe asaṅgahitoti natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0401n0:45: Khettaṁ dūsentīti khettaduṭṭhāni. Tiṇāni. Khettaduṭṭhā kilesā. Vuttañhidhammapade.
anya-e0401n0:52_0: Idha pana sātissayato khettaduṭṭhe kilese dassetuṁ “sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānusayāna”nti
anya-e0401n0:54_0: 8. “Abhivādiyā”ti sukhīhohisappurisāti evaṁ abhivadāpetvā. Abhivādanañca nāma vandanāmevāti
anya-e0401n0:54_1: vuttaṁ “vanditvā”ti. Vandantohi vandaneyye vuddhe tathā vadāpeti nāma. Tathā vadanañca
anya-e0401n0:54_4: bhikkhūhi avanditabbe sunavakatarādīsu. “Guṇapadānī”ti guṇadīpakāni arahaṁ sammāsambuddhotiādipadāni.
anya-e0401n0:54_5: Etthacakāyenavandatītiādi upacāra vacanaṁ hoti. Yathā cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatīti. Tathāhi
anya-e0401n0:54_6: vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti karaṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassana
anya-e0401n0:54_7: samatthena cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ disvā. Porāṇā panāhu cakkhu rūpaṁ na passati, acittattā.
anya-e0401n0:54_8: Cittaṁ na passati, acakkhuttā. Dvārārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭane pana sati cakkhu pasādavatthu
anya-e0401n0:54_9: kenacittena passati. Īdisī panesā kathā dhanunā vijjhatītiādīsu viya sasambhāra kathānāma
anya-e0401n0:54_10: hoti. Tasmā cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ disvāti ayamevettha atthoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_11: Etthahi “kāyenā”ti kāya viññattisaṅkhātaṁ dvāra rūpaṁ karaṇaṁ hoti. Tasmā cakkhunāti
anya-e0401n0:54_12: vacane upacāra vacane sati kāyenāti vacanaṁpi upacāra vacananti viññāyati. Tathā
anya-e0401n0:54_13: cakkhunāti pade cakkhuviññāṇenāti atthe sati kāyenāti padepi kāyakammenāti attho
anya-e0401n0:54_14: viññāyati. Vācāya vandati, manasāvandatī,ti padesupi esanayo. Evañca sati, kāya kammenavandāmi,
anya-e0401n0:54_15: vacīkammena vandāmi, manokammena vandāmi, tīhi kammehi vandāmīti idameva mukhyavacananti
anya-e0401n0:54_16: siddhaṁ hoti. Sabbamidaṁ indriya saṁvarasīlaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:54_17: Cakkhunāti idaṁ pana mukhya karaṇa vacanameva sambhavati. Kasmā, cakkhussa dassanasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0401n0:54_18: cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu purejātindriyapaccayavisesattā. Sotena saddaṁsutvātiādīsupi esanayo.
anya-e0401n0:55_0: Kāyenavandati, vācāyavandatī,ti ettha taṁkāyavacīviññatti rūpa dvayaṁ kiñcāpi sahajāta
anya-e0401n0:55_1: cetanā kammena jātaṁ hoti. Na taṁ cetanākammaṁ viññatti dvayenajātaṁ. Evaṁ santepi
anya-e0401n0:55_2: taṁ rūpa dvayaṁ tassācetanāya kāyavandanākamma, vacīvandanākamma siddhiyā upanissaya
anya-e0401n0:55_3: paccayaviseso hoti. Yathātaṁ mātito jāto putto vuddhi patto taṁ taṁ kammesu mātuyā
anya-e0401n0:55_4: bala vūpanissayo hoti. Evañca katvā taṁ rūpadvayaṁ abhidhamme dvārarūpanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:55_5: Tasmā ‘kāyena, vācāyā,ti idaṁpi mukhya karaṇa vacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kāyenāti pana
anya-e0401n0:55_6: kāyakammenāti atthe sati, tassakammassa vandanākiriyāya saha abhedo āpajjatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:55_7: Nāpajjati. Kasmā cetanāhaṁ bhikkhave kammaṁ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṁ karoti ‘kāyena,
anya-e0401n0:55_8: vācāya, manasāti imasmiṁ sutte yathāhi “cetayitvā”ti purimacetanāhi ceta yitvā. “Kammaṁ
anya-e0401n0:55_9: karotī”ti pacchimaṁ sanniṭṭhāpana cetanā kammaṁ karotīti attho. Tathā idhapi purimapacchimacetanā
anya-e0401n0:55_10: sambhavatoti. Ettha hi “kāyakammenā”ti purimacetanā kammaṁ gayhati. “Vandatī”ti pacchima
anya-e0401n0:56: 9. “Racayanto”ti vidahanto. “Racayissatī”ti apaccakkhe atīte anāgatavacanaṁ. “Potthakāruḷha”nti potthaka pattesulikhanavasena āruḷhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_2: pāḷidvayaṁ abhidhammo nāmāti vuttaṁ “tañcā”tiādi. “Yathāpavatte”ti attano paccayānurūpaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_3: pavatte. “Paramatthadhamme evā”ti dve me bhikkhave puggalā, tayomebhikkhave puggalātiādinā
anya-e0401n0:57_4: paññattivohārena pavattāpi desanā paramattha dhammehi vinā napavattati. Paramattha
anya-e0401n0:57_5: dhammānaṁ nānattavaseneva puggalānaṁ nānattasambhavato. Tasmā paramatthadhamme eva
anya-e0401n0:57_6: dīpeti. Na āṇāvidhānaṁ dīpeti. “Dvīsudhammesū”ti niddhāraṇe bhummavacanaṁ. “Yoitarato”ti
anya-e0401n0:57_7: niddhāraṇīyaṁ. “Yo”ti yo dhammo. “Itarato”ti itara dhammato suttanta dhammato. “Evañca
anya-e0401n0:57_8: katvā”ti iminākāraṇenāti attho. Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanti sambandho. Desetabbappakārānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_9: anavasesavibhattivasena atirekatā, suddha dhammādhiṭṭhāna desanā pavattivasena visesatā
anya-e0401n0:57_11: hoti. Kasmā devesu eva desentīti āha “na hi manussā”tiādiṁ. Tattha “na hi manussā
anya-e0401n0:57_14: dhammātiādikaṁ ekaṁ abhidhamma mātikaṁ anugatā. “Tassā”ti abhidhammassa. Atireka
anya-e0401n0:57_15: visesatanti sambandho. “Tatthā”ti tissaṁ aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ. Ādimhiyevatattha kenaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n0:57_16: abhidhammo, dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhe nā-ti vatvā tadatthaṁ vitthārento suttañhi
anya-e0401n0:57_17: patvā pañcakkhandhā ekadeseneva vibhattā, nanippadesena. Abhidhammaṁ patvā pana nippadesatova
anya-e0401n0:57_19: santepī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ evaṁ vicāritepisati. “Sabbajeṭṭhako”ti tiṇṇaṁ piṭakānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_20: majjhesabbajeṭṭhako. Kasmā sabbajeṭṭhako siyāti āha “vinayaṁ vivaṇṇentassahī”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_21: Tattha “vivaṇṇentassā”ti garahantassa. Carati pavattatīti cakkaṁ. Lokasmiṁ kenaci
anya-e0401n0:57_22: samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_23: āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma. Tathā asakkuṇeyyaṁ desanā vidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_24: Tattha, yo pana bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso-tiādinā
anya-e0401n0:57_25: nayena pavattaṁ āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccānī-tiādikaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_26: desanāvidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma. Tadubhayaṁpi koci bhindituṁ pārājikaṁ vā bhikkhuṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_27: apārājikaṁ kātuṁ catussaccaṁ vā dhammaṁ asaccaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti. Atha kho karontoyeva
anya-e0401n0:57_28: devadattoviya āpāyiko hoti. Pārājikoca bhikkhu attānaṁ suddhaṁ akaronto apāyagāmīyeva
anya-e0401n0:57_29: hoti. Evaṁ sabbesu vinaya sikkhāpadesu. Evaṁ kenaci paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e0401n0:57_30: tadubhayaṁpi appaṭivattiyaṁ cakkaṁ nāma hoti. “Vinayo nāma sāsanassa mūla”nti vinaye
anya-e0401n0:57_31: ṭhite bhikkhusaṅgho paññāyati. Bhikkhu saṅghe paññāyante tividhopisaddhammopaññāyati,
anya-e0401n0:57_32: tividhaṁpi satthusāsanaṁ tiṭṭhati. Evaṁ vinayo tividhassasāsanassa mūlaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:57_33: Kathañcapariyattisaddhamme paññāyante tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhatīti. Vuccate. Tattha
anya-e0401n0:57_34: sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhatīti kittakaṁkālaṁ tiṭṭhatīti. Pañcavassasahassāni tiṭṭhatīti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsukathayiṁsu.
anya-e0401n0:57_35: Micchāvādinopanavadanti vinaye cūḷavaggebhikkhunikkhandhake sace ānanda mamasāsanemātugāmo
anya-e0401n0:57_36: pabbajjaṁ nalabheyya. Vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyya. Idāni mātugāmassa pabbajjā
anya-e0401n0:57_37: anuññātā gotamiyā punappunaṁ āyācanaṁ upādāya. Pañcevadāni ānanda vassasatāni saddhammoṭhassatīti
anya-e0401n0:57_38: vuttaṁ. Tasmā buddhasāsanaṁ pañcavassasatāni eva tiṭṭhati. Tatoparaṁ ekadivasaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:57_39: na tiṭṭhati. Idāni sāsanappaṭi rūpakamattaṁ hotīti. Taṁ tesaṁ micchā vacanamattaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_40: “Pañcevavassasatānī”ti idaṁ pana sanniṭṭhāna vacanaṁ nahoti. Mātugāmānaṁ ādīnava
anya-e0401n0:57_41: dīpanamattavacanaṁ. So ca ādīnavo aṭṭhagarudhamme saṇṭhapetvā satthārā eva paṭibāhito.
anya-e0401n0:57_42: Puna “vassasahassa”nti idamevasanniṭṭhāna vacanaṁ jātanti. Etthapikecivadanti vassasahassameva
anya-e0401n0:57_43: sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhati, tatoparaṁ ekadivasa mattaṁpi na tiṭṭhati, antaradhāyati. Tadā sīmāyopi
anya-e0401n0:57_44: asīmā honti. Pacchātāsu upasampāditāpi anupasampannā honti. Idāni sāsanappaṭi rūpakamattaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_45: hotīti. Idaṁpi tesaṁ atthañcakāraṇañca adisvā ajānitvā vuttattā micchā vacanamattaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_46: hoti. Ayaṁ panettha attho. “Vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā”ti vassasahassameva
anya-e0401n0:57_47: saddhammo aparihāyamāno tiṭṭheyya. Tatoparaṁ pana na tiṭṭheyya, anukkamena parihāyamāno
anya-e0401n0:57_48: gaccheyyāti. Kathaṁ pana aparihāyamāno tiṭṭhati, kathañca parihāyamāno gacchatīti.
anya-e0401n0:57_49: Vuccate. Pañcasaṅghā veditabbā. Yesu saṅghe susaddhammo tiṭṭhati. Katame pañca. Khīṇāsavasaṅgho,
anya-e0401n0:57_51: vassasahassabbhantare sabbepañcasaṅghā paññāyanti. Evaṁ vassasahassaṁ saddhammo aparihāyamāno
anya-e0401n0:57_52: tiṭṭhati. Tatoparaṁ khīṇāsavasaṅgho na paññāyati. Sesāni cattārivassasahassāni anukkamena
anya-e0401n0:57_53: sesānaṁ catunnaṁ saṅghānaṁ khettāni jātāni. Evaṁ tatoparaṁ parihāyamāno gacchatīti
anya-e0401n0:57_54: ayamettha attho. Kāraṇaṁ vuccate. “Saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā”ti ettha tividho saddhammo
anya-e0401n0:57_55: ‘pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo, paṭivedhasaddhammo,ti. So eva tividhaṁ sāsananti
anya-e0401n0:57_56: ca vuccati. Tattha, pariyatti saddhammo nāma sāṭṭhakathānitīṇipiṭakāni. Soca etarahi
anya-e0401n0:57_57: paripuṇṇo tiṭṭhati. Kathaṁ pariyatti sāsanaṁ paṭirūpakamattaṁ bhaveyya. Bhikkhū ca
anya-e0401n0:57_58: pariyattikammikā aneka satasahassamattā paññāyanti. Kathañcidaṁ sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_59: ekadivasaṁpi na tiṭṭheyya. Te ca bhikkhū sīlappaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitā aneka satasahassamattā
anya-e0401n0:57_60: etarahi sandhissanti. Kathañca paṭipatti sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ na tiṭṭheyya. Pariyattiyāca
anya-e0401n0:57_61: paṭipattiyāca tiṭṭhamānāyapaṭivedhasaddhammopi na tiṭṭhatīti na vattabbo. Yathāhi-eko
anya-e0401n0:57_62: dhanaseṭṭhi nāma atthi. So puttadhītu paramparānaṁ atthāya mahantāratananidhayo bhūmiyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_63: bahūsuṭṭhānesu nidahitvā ṭhapitā honti. Potthakesu ca tesaṁ pavattiṁ paripuṇṇaṁ likhitvā
anya-e0401n0:57_64: ṭhapeti. Tattha nimīsu ca potthakesu ca akkharesu ca dharantesu tenidhayo nassanti
anya-e0401n0:57_65: antaradhāyantīti na vattabbāyeva. Evamidaṁ sāsanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tatthahi nidhīnaṁnidhānabhūmisadisaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_66: tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ, dhanaratanasadisāni dhammaratanāni. Yathā ca seṭṭhivaṁsejāto
anya-e0401n0:57_67: balasampanno puriso potthakaṁ passitvā suṭṭhu khaṇanto tāniratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_68: Evamidhapi balasampanno bhikkhu desanādhammaṁ sutvā suṭṭhu paṭipajjanto tānidhammaratanāni
anya-e0401n0:57_69: labhissatiyeva. Labhamāne ca sati, kathaṁ tānidhammaratanāni antarahitāni. Sīmānañca
anya-e0401n0:57_70: pavattivānivatti vā āṇācakkasseva visayo hoti. Na dhammacakkassa. Yañca vuttaṁ-pañcevavassasatānisaddhammo
anya-e0401n0:57_71: ṭhassatīti ca, - vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyāti ca. Idañca vacanaṁ dhammacakkameva
anya-e0401n0:57_72: hoti, na āṇācakkaṁ. Baddhasīmāyo ca nivattamānā dvīhi kāraṇehi nivattanti antaradhāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_73: Āṇācakkabhūtāya kammavācāya samūhananena vā, sāsanassa vā antaradhānena. Tattha vassasahassapariyante
anya-e0401n0:57_74: kammavācāya samūhananañca natthi. Sāsanantaradhānañca nāma anāgate dhātuparinibbānena
anya-e0401n0:57_75: paricchinnaṁ hoti. Dhātuparinibbānehi jāte sabbaṁ āṇācakkaṁ vigataṁ hoti, antaradhāyati.
anya-e0401n0:57_76: Dhammacakkaṁ pana devalokesu yāvānāgatabuddhakālāpi pavattissatiyeva āḷavakapucchāgāthāyo
anya-e0401n0:57_77: viya. Apicayo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto. So vo mamaccayena
anya-e0401n0:57_78: satthā-ti vuttaṁ. Socati piṭakabhūto dhammavinayo satthā etarahi tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_79: lokassa dīpento pakāsento tiṭṭhati. Yatobuddhabhāsikānaṁ devamanussānaṁ nānā bāhirakehi
anya-e0401n0:57_80: janehi asādhāraṇo mahanto ñāṇāloko etarahi vijjotamāno pavattati. Tehi sabbaññutaññāṇena
anya-e0401n0:57_81: desitāni etarahidharamānāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandha sahassāni sutvā anamataggesaṁsāre
anya-e0401n0:57_83: sutamayaññāṇena jānanti. Āyatiñca saggatthāya ca maggaphalanibbānatthāya ca nānāpuññakiriyavatthūni
anya-e0401n0:57_84: ārabhanti, pabbajanti. Pariyattiṁ pariyāpuṇanti. Paṭipattiṁ pūrenti. Bhāvanaṁbhāventi.
anya-e0401n0:57_85: Idaṁ sabbaṁ sāsanappaṭirūpakamattaṁna hoti. Ekanta sāsanaṁ hoti. Kasmā, yathā dhammaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_86: yathā vinayaṁ paṭipajjanato. Imāya ca paṭipattiyā āyatiṁ saggamaggaphala nibbānappaṭilābhāya
anya-e0401n0:57_87: saṁvattanikattāti. Ettāvatā sabbaṁ micchāvādīnaṁ micchāvacanaṁ vidhamitaṁviddhaṁsitaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:59_2: dīpite teabhidhammatthe. “Tatthā”ti tissaṁ dutīyagāthāyaṁ. “Natu vutta”nti napanapakaraṇaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:59_3: pubbevuttaṁ hoti. Abhidhammatthā kutopubbevuttā hontīti yojanā. Evaṁtīsu atthavikappesu
anya-e0401n0:59_4: pathamassa kālavirodhaṁ dassetvā idāni dutīya tatīyānaṁ saddatovirodhaṁ vattuṁ “nacā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:59_5: Tattha “ādimhi yevā”ti etena yadākadāci paccāmasanaṁ appadhānanti dasseti. “Appadhānapadānī”ti
anya-e0401n0:59_6: abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti imasmiṁ ekasmiṁ samāsapade purimāni visesana padāni. Tattha
anya-e0401n0:59_7: sabbathāpi vuttāti yojite sati, tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahappakaraṇe tasmiṁ abhidhammattha
anya-e0401n0:59_8: padevā sabbathā mayā vuttāti attho hoti. So na yujjati. Tasmiṁ abhidhamme buddhena
anya-e0401n0:59_9: bhagavatā sabbathā vuttāti attho yujjati. Appadhānapadaṁ paccāmasatīti dosopana āpajjateva.
anya-e0401n0:59_10: Tenāha “evañhisatī”tiādiṁ. Tattha, “evañhisatī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ viya idha abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadaṁ
anya-e0401n0:59_11: paccāmasante sati. Hisaddo phala vākyajotako. Laddhaguṇajotakotipi yujjati. “Paṭikkhittā
anya-e0401n0:59_12: hoti” tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā sabbathā vuttāti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:59_13: Na kevalaṁ so eva doso āpajjati. Aparopidoso atthīti dassetuṁ “sāhī”tiādimāha. Dhātukathāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_0: 12. Paramatthapadavaṇṇanāyaṁ. Visesanapadaṁ nāma katthaci bhūtakathanatthāyavā payujjati
anya-e0401n0:60_1: kaṇhokāko, setobako,ti. Katthaci aññanivattanatthāya vā payujjati nīlopaṭo, nīlaṁpuppha,
anya-e0401n0:60_2: nti. Idha pana añña nivattanatthāyāti dassetuṁ “duvidhānihisaccānī”tiādimāha. Paññāpīyatītipaññatti.
anya-e0401n0:60_3: Paññāpanañca nāma samaggānaṁ janānaṁ vohārena ca sampaṭicchanena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi
anya-e0401n0:60_4: sijjhatīti āha “tecamahājanā”tiādiṁ. “Tasmāte sammuti saccanti vuccantī”ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:60_6: vacīsaccaṁ nāma musāvādarahitaṁ saccavacanaṁ. Viratisaccaṁ nāma sammāvācāvirati.
anya-e0401n0:60_7: Sāhi musāvādādīhi vacīduccaritehi viramaṇamattena vacīsaccanti vuccati. “Vatthubhūtattā”ti
anya-e0401n0:60_8: adhiṭṭhānabhūtattā. Sammutisaccanti vuccanti, sammatattā sammuti ca, sā saccānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_9: vatthubhūtattā saccañcāti katvā. Sammutiyā siddhaṁ saccaṁ sammutisaccantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:60_10: “Sammāpaṭipajjantā”ti pāṇo nahantabbo, sabbesattā averā hontūtiādinā sammāpaṭipajjantā.
anya-e0401n0:60_14: “Evaṁ mahantaṁ sammuti sacca”nti etena ahaṁ paramattha saccamevagaṇhāmīti sammuti
anya-e0401n0:60_15: saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ. Bhindantohi sabbasampattīhi paribāhiro assāti dasseti. Kathañca
anya-e0401n0:60_16: taṁ bhindatīti. Satto nāma natthi. Sattassa bhavatosaṅkanti nāma natthi. Bhavanibbattakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_17: kusalākusalakammaṁ nāma natthīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati. Sabbasampattīhi
anya-e0401n0:60_18: paribāhiro hoti. Apāya pūrako bhavatīti. “Vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpetī”ti saññā cittadiṭṭhi
anya-e0401n0:60_20: sammutisacca”nti etenasammuti saccamevadaḷhaṁ gahetvā paramattha saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_21: Bhindantohi tāhi diṭṭhīhi namuccati. Kathañca taṁ bhindati. Khandhe vā khandhamuttakevā
anya-e0401n0:60_22: attajīve gahetvā teca attajīvā parammaraṇā ucchijjantīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_23: tiṭṭhati. Te ca attajīvā bhavābhavesusassatā hutvā bhavatobhavaṁ saṁsaranti sandhāvantīti
anya-e0401n0:60_25: sabhāvasaccaṁ pana. Anubhavanabhedamattaṁ upādāyeva vedanā sukhāti vuttā. Sabbākārato
anya-e0401n0:60_26: sukhabhūtattā vedanā sukhāti vuttā nahoti. “Sabbāpivedanā dukkhā evā”ti padhānattho.
anya-e0401n0:60_27: Tattha anubhavanabhedo tividho. Sātato vā anubhavanaṁ, assātato vā, majjhattato vā.
anya-e0401n0:60_28: “Dukkhā evā”ti bhayaṭṭhena dukkhā eva. Bhayaṭṭhenāti ca saṁsāra bhayadassīhibhāyitabbaṭṭhena.
anya-e0401n0:60_29: Sukho vipāko yesaṁ te sukhavipākā. Tebhūmakakusalā. “Kusalasammatā”ti etena sabhāvasaccepi
anya-e0401n0:60_30: etevohārā lokasammuti nissitāti dīpeti. “Sāsavatā”ti āsavehi sahitabhāvo. “Saṁkilesi
anya-e0401n0:60_31: katā”ti saṁkilesa dhammehi saṁyuttabhāvo. Oghehi ca yogehi ca upādānehi ca pattabbabhāvo
anya-e0401n0:60_33: attānāma sāraṭṭhena. Sākhāyaṁ rūpadhammā sākhāya attānāma sāraṭṭhena. Sattasantānapariyāpannā
anya-e0401n0:60_34: pana rūpārūpadhammā taṇhāpariggaha daḷhaṭṭhena tato bahiddhā attato adhikā attāti
anya-e0401n0:60_35: atthena ajjhattāti lokasammuti hoti. Tenāha “ajjhattatikañcā”tiādiṁ. Dukkhanirodha
anya-e0401n0:60_36: maggabhāvo ca, iti idaṁ catukkaṁ ariyasaccaṁ nāmāti yojanā. “Idamevā”ti idaṁ catukkameva.
anya-e0401n0:60_37: “Acalamāna”nti etena ariyasaddassa atthaṁ dīpeti. Tebhūmaka dhammānaṁ sukhatā nāma
anya-e0401n0:60_38: calā hoti. Kasmā, anicca dhammattā. Te dhammesukhāti gahetvā attano ajjhattaṅgaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_39: karontā acireneva dukkhaṁ pāpuṇanti. Te dhamme dukkhāti ñatvā tehivimuttā puna dukkhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_40: pāpuṇantīti natthi. Esanayo sesaariyasaccesu. “Tesū”tiādimhi duvidhānihi saccānīti
anya-e0401n0:60_41: vuttesu dvīsu saccesu. “Tena vutta”ntiādi laddhaguṇavacanaṁ. “Yo vinā aññāpadesenā”ti
anya-e0401n0:60_42: ettha aññāpadeso nāma aṭṭhadhamma samodhānaṁ nissāya ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṁ paññāyati, paṭasaṇṭhānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_43: paññāyati, taṁ saṇṭhānaṁ attano sabhāvena vinā aññāpadesena siddhaṁ hoti. Yāpanacintana
anya-e0401n0:60_44: kiriyā nāma atthi. Yaṁ cittanti vuccati. Sā aññāpadesena siddhā na hoti. Attano sabhāvenevasiddhā.
anya-e0401n0:60_45: Esanayo phusanakiriyā, vedayitakiriyā, dīsūti. Imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “yovinā aññāpadesenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:60_46: “Cittenaparikappetvā”ti manoviññāṇa cittena avijjamānaṁ saṇṭhānaṁ vijjamānaṁ katvā.
anya-e0401n0:60_47: “Saviggahaṁ katvā”ti sarīraṁ katvā. Vatthu dabbasahitaṁ katvāti vuttaṁ hoti. “Cittamayocittanimmito”ti
anya-e0401n0:60_48: supinante diṭṭharūpāni viya cittenapakato cittena nimmito. Kasmā sabhāvasiddho paramattho
anya-e0401n0:60_49: nāmāti āha “sohī”tiādiṁ. “Santī”ti etena asadhātu vasena atthoti siddhaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_51: “Paramo”ti adhiko. Tenāha “ukkaṁsagato”ti. Etena paramasaddassa adhikatthaṁ vadati.
anya-e0401n0:60_52: Idāni tassa uttamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “apicā”tiādivuttaṁ. Tattha, imasmiṁ buddhasāsane
anya-e0401n0:60_53: pañcasāsana kiccāni mahantāni abhiññeyyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhijānanaṁ. Pariññeyyānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_54: parijānanaṁ. Pahātabbānaṁ pahānaṁ. Sacchi kātabbānaṁ sacchikaraṇaṁ. Bhāvetabbānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_55: bhāvanāti. Tattha sabbepi paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā nāma. Dukkha saccadhammā pariññeyyā
anya-e0401n0:60_56: nāma. Samudaya saccadhammā pahātabbā nāma. Sāmaññapphalāni ca nibbānañca sacchikātabbā
anya-e0401n0:60_57: nāma. Maggasaccadhammā bhāvetabbā nāma. Tesu dhammesu tesaṁ kiccānaṁ siddhiyā imasmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_58: sāsane sāsanakiccaṁ siddhaṁ hoti. Niṭṭhānaṁ gacchati. Te ca dhammā eva rūpānaṁ sāsana
anya-e0401n0:60_59: kiccānaṁ avirādhakattā avisaṁvādakattā uttamaṭṭhena paramatthā nāma hontīti imamatthaṁ
anya-e0401n0:61_0: “Taṁ nasundara”nti byañjanato nasundaraṁ. Nakevalaṁ byañjanatoyeva nasundaraṁ, atthatopi
anya-e0401n0:61_1: nasundarameva. Catusacca dhammāhi paccekabuddhaññāṇassapi gocarā honti. Pañcañeyya
anya-e0401n0:61_2: dhammā pana sabbaññutaññāṇasseva. Tattha catusacca dhammā nāma paramattha dhammā
anya-e0401n0:61_3: eva. Pañcañeyyadhammā pana sabba paññattiyā saha sabbaparamattha dhammā. Sabbaññubuddhānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:61_4: catusaccābhi sambodho dhamma paññattiyā saha sijjhati. Paccekabuddhānaṁ catusacca
anya-e0401n0:61_5: sambodho dhammapaññattiyā saha nasijjhati. Tasmā te sayaṁ paṭividdhaṁ catusacca dhammaṁ
anya-e0401n0:61_6: nāma paññattiṁ nīharitvā paresaṁ desetuṁ na sakkonti. Tesaṁ catusaccasambodho mūgassa
anya-e0401n0:61_7: supinadassanaṁ viya hotīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ. Tasmā paññattiyā saha pañca ñeyya
anya-e0401n0:63_0: 13. Cittavacanatthe. Nahi sā ārammaṇenavinā labbhati. Cintetīti vutte kiṁ cinteti,
anya-e0401n0:63_1: ārammaṇaṁ cintetīti evaṁ ārammaṇabhūtena kammapadena vinā asambhavato. Tasmā idha
anya-e0401n0:63_2: cintanāti daṭṭhabbā, tasmā assa nāmaṁ siddhanti daṭṭhabbanti sambandho. Sutamayaññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:63_3: cintāmayaññāṇa, nti ettha ārammaṇassa bhūtasabhāva cintāpi atthi, sāpaññāevāti taṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_4: nivattetuṁ “ārammaṇa…pe… ṇūpaladdhiyevā”ti vuttaṁ. Cittaṁ, mano, mānasaṁ, viññāṇa,
anya-e0401n0:63_5: nti sabbaṁ cittassa nāmaṁ. Ārammaṇa paccayappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti. Na aññapaccayappaṭibaddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_6: Na ca aññapaccayena laddhaṁ nāmaṁ. Evarūpassa ārammaṇa vijānana saṅkhātassa atthantarassabodhakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_7: nahotīti dassetuṁ “santesu cā”tiādivuttaṁ. “Etenā”ti idaṁ kattuno kiriyāsādhane atissayūpakārakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_8: karaṇa sādhanaṁ vadatīti dassetuṁ “tañhī”tiādivuttaṁ. “Cintanamatta”nti ettha mattasaddo
anya-e0401n0:63_9: visesanivatti atthoti, tena nivattitaṁ atthaṁ dasseti “sabbepihī”tiādinā. “Viggaho
anya-e0401n0:63_10: vā”ti sarīraṁ vā. Paccayena āyattā paccayāyattā. “Āyattā”ti sambandhā. Vattanaṁ vutti.
anya-e0401n0:63_11: Uppajjanaṁ vā ṭhiti vā. Paccayāyattā vutti etesanti “paccayāyatta vuttino”. “Thāmenā”tiādi
anya-e0401n0:63_12: aññamaññavevacanāni. “Ekaṁ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhatī”ti idaṁ dhammānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_13: taṁ taṁ kiriyā mattabhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Kiriyāmattabhūtāpi pana te dhammāsayaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_14: nānāpaccayā vatthāyaṁ ṭhitā vā honti nānāpaccayuppannāvatthāyaṁ ṭhitā vā. Tasmā paramattha
anya-e0401n0:63_15: padesupi yathārahaṁ tadaññasādhanānaṁ paṭilābho avārito hoti. Itarathā hetu paccayo,
anya-e0401n0:63_16: ārammaṇa paccayo, sahajātapaccayo, nissayapaccayotiādīsu kathaṁ bhāvasādhanaṁ yuttaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_18: cittantikataṁ kattusādhanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. “Silāputtakassā”ti bhesajjamūlānaṁ pisanasilāpotakassa.
anya-e0401n0:63_19: Tassa sarīraṁ nāma visuṁ aṅgaṁ natthi. Abhinnaṁpi bhinnaṁ katvā vuccati “silāputtakasarīra”nti.
anya-e0401n0:63_20: Idaṁ abhedassabhedakaraṇaṁ nāma abhūtarūpaṁ hoti. Payojane sati vattabbaṁ, asati
anya-e0401n0:63_21: na vattabbanti āha “tathākaraṇañcā”tiādiṁ. Tattha “paraparikappitassā”ti parehi aññatitthā
anya-e0401n0:63_22: cariyehi paricintitassa. “Satihi…pe… kappanāyā”ti sace attā atthi, attā cinteti,
anya-e0401n0:63_23: tasmā attā cittonāmātiādi vattabbaṁ. Na vattabbaṁ cintetīti cittanti, cittassa kiriyāmattattā.
anya-e0401n0:63_24: Na pana attādiko kattā nāma atthi. Tasmā kiriyā mattameva kattāraṁ katvā “cintetīti
anya-e0401n0:63_25: citta”nti vuttaṁ. Tena viññāyatiloke attādikokattā nāma natthīti. Idaṁ abhedassabheda
anya-e0401n0:63_26: parikappanāya payojananti vuttaṁ hoti. “Attappadhāno”ti kiriyāsādhane bahūnaṁkārakānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_27: majjhe sayaṁpadhāno sayaṁjeṭṭhako hutvā. “Taṁkattubhāva”nti lokesiddhaṁ kattubhāvaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_28: “Puna karaṇabhāva”nti puna loke siddhaṁ karaṇabhāvaṁ. Evaṁ cittassa vacanatthaṁ dassetvā
anya-e0401n0:63_29: idāni tassa abhidhānatthaṁ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha. Yathayidaṁ ye ime tiracchānagatā
anya-e0401n0:63_30: pāṇā cittāvicittā. Evaṁ cittaṁ vicittaṁ yaṁ aññaṁ atthi, taṁ aññaṁ ekanikāyaṁpi nasamanupassāmī-ti
anya-e0401n0:63_32: karaṇavacanaṁ. Etena tato caraṇato cittatoti atthaṁ vadati. Gāthāyaṁ. “Taṁ taṁ sabhāvo”ti
anya-e0401n0:63_33: vijānanaphusanādiko sabhāvo, aggissauṇhoviya. “Kiccasampattiyoraso”ti tena tena dhammena
anya-e0401n0:63_34: karaṇakiccañca, taṁ kiccaṁ katvā laddho sampattiguṇo ca. Aggissa vatthumhi paripācanakiccaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_35: viya, obhāsanaguṇoviya ca. “Gayhākāro”ti ñāṇena gahetabbo tassa tassa dhammassa dhajabhūto
anya-e0401n0:63_36: ākāro. Sampatti rasoyeva vuccati. “Phalaṁvāpī”ti kāriyapphalaṁ vāpi, aggissa dhūmoviya.
anya-e0401n0:63_37: “Āsannakāraṇa”nti attano anantare phalanibbattakaṁ kāraṇaṁ, aggissa aggikāraka puriso
anya-e0401n0:65_0: 14. “Cetasi bhava”nti cittasmiṁ pātubhūtaṁ. “Etena siddhā hontī”ti sambandho. “Sā
anya-e0401n0:65_1: eva phassādīnaṁ jāti. Yācittassajarā, sā eva phassādīnaṁjarā”tiādinā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:65_3: ekajātikathā divasena upanibandhā. “Ce”ti cevadeyya. “Nā”ti na vattabbaṁ. Gāthāyaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:65_4: “Dhammā”ti nāmakkhandha dhammā. “Manasā evā”ti kattubhūtena manena eva. “Pakatā”ti
anya-e0401n0:65_5: pavattitā. “Nimmitā”ti nipphāditā. “Cittakiriyā bhūtā evā”ti ārammaṇaṁ vijānantaṁ
anya-e0401n0:65_6: cittaṁ phusanākāraṁ janetvāva vijānāti. So phusanākāro phassoti vuccati. Avasesā
anya-e0401n0:65_7: pana sabbepi cetasikadhammā phassaṁ paṭicca uppajjanti. Phasso hetu phasso paccayo
anya-e0401n0:65_8: vedanākkhandhassa upādāya. Saññākkhandhassa. Saṅkhārakkhandhassa upādāyāti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:65_9: Evaṁ santepi cittamūlakattā cittanissitattā ca tepidhammā cittakiri yābhūtā eva hontīti.
anya-e0401n0:65_10: “Etenā”ti etenagāthāpadena. Vibhāvaniyaṁ pana ekālambaṇatā mattena vibhāveti. Paripuṇṇāni
anya-e0401n0:65_11: ce tasikaṅgāni upari therena sayameva vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo. Idha pana padatthavibhāvanaṭṭhānattā
anya-e0401n0:65_12: paripuṇṇehi aṅgehi vibhāvetuṁ vaṭṭatīti āha “taṁ nasundara”nti. “Vatthumhī”ti paṭakoṭṭhakādimhi.
anya-e0401n0:65_13: “Nānācittakammānī”ti hatthi assarūpādīni. Vijānanamattaṁ cittaṁ, kusalanti vā akusalanti
anya-e0401n0:65_14: vā vattabbaṁ natthi. Nānācetasike hi yuttattā eva tathā vattabbaṁ hoti. Vuttaṁhetaṁ
anya-e0401n0:65_15: bhagavatā. Pabhassaramidaṁ bhikkhave cittaṁ. Tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhanti.
anya-e0401n0:67_0: 15. Ruppatīti padaṁ kattarivāhetukammanivāsiddhaṁ. Ruppanañcavikārāpatti evāti dassetuṁ
anya-e0401n0:67_2: Dhātukkho bhavasenāti vuttaṁ hoti, “kenaruppatī”ti ettha “kenā”ti hetu atthevā hetu
anya-e0401n0:67_3: kattarivā karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tathā sītenātiādīsupi. Ḍaṁsamakasā nāma sūcimukhā
anya-e0401n0:67_4: khuddakamakkhikāceva mahanta makkhikā ca. Vātā nāma puratthimavātādayo. Ātapo nāma
anya-e0401n0:67_5: sūriyātapo. Sariṁsapānāma ahi vicchika satapadikādayo. Tesaṁ samphassehipi ruppati.
anya-e0401n0:67_6: Maraṇaṁ vā gacchati, maraṇa mattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ. “Ye dhammā”ti dvādasavidhā sappaṭigharūpadhammā.
anya-e0401n0:67_8: Idāni pāḷiyā saddhiṁ mukhyaruppanaṁ saṁsandento “samāgamo cā”tiādimāha. Samāgamo
anya-e0401n0:67_9: ca nāma aññamaññābhighaṭṭanaṁ vuccatīti sambandho. Āpātāgamanañca ārammaṇakaraṇañca
anya-e0401n0:67_10: ṭhapetvāti yojanā. “Mahābhūtānameva vā”ti āpodhātu vajjitānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ mahābhūtānameva
anya-e0401n0:67_11: vā. “Vikāraṁ āpajjatī”ti vatvā tamevatthaṁ vivaranto “yasmiṁ khaṇe”tiādimāha. “Sayaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:67_12: vikārapattā hontī”ti temahābhūtāsayaṁpi pakatiṁ vijahitvā omattādhimattabhāvaṁ pāpuṇantīti
anya-e0401n0:67_14: vuttaṁ. Evaṁ pāḷinayena vipattivasena ruppanaṁ vatvā idāni vipatti vā hotu, sampatti
anya-e0401n0:67_15: vā. Purimapacchi masantatīnaṁ visadisappavattibhūto vikāropi ekena pariyāyena ruppanaṁnāmāti
anya-e0401n0:67_16: katvā puna taṁ ruppanaṁ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha. “Ghaṭṭanavasena ruppana dhammāna
anya-e0401n0:67_18: rūpadhammānameva siddhanti pucchā. “Saviggahā hontī”ti dabba saṇṭhānākārasahitā honti.
anya-e0401n0:67_20: Arūpadhammāhi saṇhasukhumasabhāvā ca honti. Sace anekasatasahassānipi ekato pavatteyyuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:67_21: Dabbasaṇṭhānabhāvaṁ nagamissantiyeva. Ekasmiñca sattasantāne ekakkhaṇe eka kalāpova
anya-e0401n0:67_22: pavattati. Kasmā, anantara paccayūpanibandhena pavattattā. Tasmāte saviggahāna honti.
anya-e0401n0:67_23: Rūpadhammā pana oḷārika sabhāvā ca honti. Bahūnaṁ sannicayesati dabbasaṇṭhānatthāya
anya-e0401n0:67_24: saṁvattanti. Ekakkhaṇe ca bahukalāpāpi ekābaddhāhutvā pavattanti. Tasmā tesaviggahāhontīti.
anya-e0401n0:68_0: “Sītādiggahaṇasāmatthiyenā”ti sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatītiādinā lokassa paccakkhato
anya-e0401n0:68_1: pākaṭassa sītādivacanassasāmatthiyena. Tañhi vacanaṁ lokassa apākaṭaṁ arūpadhammānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:68_2: ruppanaṁ idhanādhippetanti dīpetīti adhippāyo. “Vohāro nāmā”ti nāmasaññā nāmāti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n0:68_3: hoti. “Lokopacārenā”ti bahujanassa upacārena vohārena kathanena. “Pākaṭa nimittavasenevā”ti
anya-e0401n0:68_5: sītādiggahaṇasāmatthiyenapīti dīpeti. Evaṁ santepi pāḷisādhakaṁ nāma na sakkāsabbattha
anya-e0401n0:68_6: laddhuṁ. Pākaṭanimitta vacanameva sabbattha sādhāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Tappasaṅganivattī”ti
anya-e0401n0:68_9: “Idaṁ panā”ti idaṁ rūpaṁ pana. “Anuggahānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasenā”ti kiñcāpipāḷiyaṁ sītādivacanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:68_10: upaghātakānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasena vuttaṁ. Teca brahmaloke natthi. Anuggāhakā eva atthi.
anya-e0401n0:68_11: Tesaṁvasenāti adhippāyo. “Pāḷiyaṁ niddiṭṭhānī”ti sañjānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā
anya-e0401n0:68_12: saññāti vuccati. Kiñca sañjānāti. Nīlaṁpi sañjānāti, pītampi sañjānātī-tiādinā ca,
anya-e0401n0:68_13: vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā viññāṇanti vuccati. Kiñca vijānāti. Madhuraṁpi vijānāti,
anya-e0401n0:70_0: 16. Nibbānapade. “Khandhāvā”ti bhavantare apāyādīsu bhavissamānā khandhāvā. Na hi
anya-e0401n0:70_1: atīta dhammā, nibbāyanti nāma, satte pīḷetvā niruddhattāti adhippāyo. Paccuppannā
anya-e0401n0:70_2: ca dhammā etarahi pīḷenti, avassaṁ uppajjamānā anāgatadhammā ca anāgate pīḷessanti,
anya-e0401n0:70_3: kathaṁ te nibbāyanti nāmāti āha “paccuppannesu…pe… vattabbameva natthī”ti. “Visayebhumma”nti
anya-e0401n0:70_4: visayādhārebhummaṁ. Visayādhāro nāmamanussābhūmiyaṁ gacchantītiādīsu viya mukhyādhāro
anya-e0401n0:70_5: nahoti. Tena pana vinā aññattha taṁ kiriyaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti. Tasmā ādhārabhāvena
anya-e0401n0:70_6: parikappito ādhāroti dassetuṁ “yathāākāse”tiādivuttaṁ. Yathā sakuṇānaṁ pakkhana kiriyā
anya-e0401n0:70_7: nāma ākāsena vinā aññattha nasijjhati. Tathā vaṭṭadukkhadhammānaṁ nibbuti kiriyāpi
anya-e0401n0:70_8: nibbānena vinā aññattha nasijjhatīti dassetuṁ “yehite”tiādimāha. Tattha “ye”ti yetividhavaṭṭadukkhasantāpadhammā.
anya-e0401n0:70_10: nāma natthi. Tasmā nibbānaṁ tesaṁ nibbuti kiriyāya visayā dhārohotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:70_11: Yathā ayaṁ padīpo nibbāyati. Tathādhīrā nibbantīti yojanā. “Taṁ taṁ kilesānaṁ vā”ti
anya-e0401n0:70_12: te saṁtesaṁkilesānaṁ vā. “Khandhānaṁ vā”ti anāgatabhavesu khandhānaṁ vā. “Punaappaṭisandhikabhāva”nti
anya-e0401n0:70_13: santānassa puna paṭisandhānābhāvaṁ pāpuṇanti ariyā janā. Yathā magge karaṇavacanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:70_14: dissati addhā imāyapaṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmītiādīsu. Na tathā nibbāneti
anya-e0401n0:70_16: Asesaṁ uparujjhatītiādīsu. Tasmā nibbāne karaṇa vacanaṁ na dissati, karaṇa lakkhaṇasseva
anya-e0401n0:70_17: abhāvatoti dassetuṁ “na ca nibbāna”ntiādi vuttaṁ. Karaṇa lakkhaṇaṁ nāmakattuno sahakārī
anya-e0401n0:70_18: paccayabhāvo. Nanu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbāyantīti dissatīti. Saccaṁ, tattha
anya-e0401n0:70_19: pana visesane karaṇa vacanaṁ. Na karaṇakārake. Tañhi saupādisesanibbānadhātuyānivattanatthaṁ vuttanti.
anya-e0401n0:73_1: āgataṁ. “Tekāmīyantī”ti te avīcinirayādayo icchīyanti. “Tattha uppannānampī”ti avīcinirayādīsu
anya-e0401n0:73_2: uppannānaṁpi sattānaṁ. “Bhavanikanti nāma hotī”ti bhavasaṅkhātaṁ attano khandhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:73_3: etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti gaṇhantī taṇhā bhavanikanti nāma. Sā nerayikasattānaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:73_4: atthiyeva. “Kāme avacaratī”ti kāmepariyāpannaṁ hoti. Kāme antogadhaṁ hoti. Rūpārūpabhūmīsu
anya-e0401n0:73_5: uppannaṁpi rūpārūpasaṅkhyaṁ nagacchati. Kāmasaṅkhyameva gacchati. Kāmagaṇanamevagacchatīti
anya-e0401n0:73_6: attho. “Tīsubhavesu uppannānipī”ti kāmarūpārūpasattasantānesu uppannānipi na tatrapariyā
anya-e0401n0:73_7: pannāneva honti. Tatra apariyāpannāneva hontīti adhippāyo. “Kāmāvacaratāpattidoso”ti
anya-e0401n0:73_8: kāmāvacara dhammāti vattabbatā pattidoso. “Rūpāvacaratādimuttidoso”ti ime rūpāvacara
anya-e0401n0:73_9: dhammā na honti, arūpāvacara dhammā na honti, lokuttara dhammā na hontīti evaṁ vattabbatāpatti
anya-e0401n0:73_10: dosoti vuttaṁ hoti. Esanayo “rūpārūpāvacaratāpatti doso kāmāvacaratāmutti doso” tipadesu.
anya-e0401n0:73_11: Avacarasaddassa uppannatthe gahitepi etedosā nāpajjanti. Kasmā, loke yebhūyyanayatabbahulanayānaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:73_13: kesañci puggalānaṁ vā dhammānaṁ vā. Yathāmigaluddako gāme carantopi vane caraṇabahulattā
anya-e0401n0:73_14: vanacarakoti nāmaṁ labhati. Rājahatthī aññattha carantopi saṅgāme caraṇabahulattā
anya-e0401n0:73_15: saṅgāmāvacaroti nāmaṁ labhati. Ayaṁ yebhūyyanayo nāma. Yasmiṁ vane ambarukkhāpi atthi,
anya-e0401n0:73_16: aññarukkhāpi atthi. Ambarukkhabahulattā pana taṁ vanaṁ ambavananti nāmaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_17: Evaṁ simbalivanādīsu. Ayaṁ tabbahulanayo. Idha pana bhūmiyo tabbahulanayena kāmarūpārūpa
anya-e0401n0:73_18: nāmaṁ labhanti, dhammā yebhūyyanayena kāmāvacarādi nāmaṁ labhantīti. Evaṁ gahite
anya-e0401n0:73_19: sati, te dosānā pajjantīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “tasmā idhapi…pe… dosotī”tiāha. “Nā”ti
anya-e0401n0:73_20: na kocidoso natthi. Atthi evāti adhippāyo. “Tasmāssā”ti ettha “assā”ti avacarasaddassa.
anya-e0401n0:73_21: “Tathā atthaṁ aggahetvā”ti uppajjanatthaṁ aggahetvā. “Pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya kato”ti
anya-e0401n0:73_22: tathā pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya gocaravisayattātāyataṇhāya katonāma hoti. Etena kāmetīti
anya-e0401n0:73_23: kāmo, kāmataṇhā. Avacarati etthāti avacaraṁ. Kāmassa avacaranti kāmāvacaraṁ. Kāma
anya-e0401n0:74_1: pariyāpannabhāvena pavattati. Arūpe avacaratīti arūpāvacaraṁ. “Arūpe”ti catubbidhāya
anya-e0401n0:74_2: arūpabhūmiyā. “Avacaratī”ti tattha pariyāpannabhāvena pavattatīti imamatthaṁ vadati
anya-e0401n0:74_3: “rūpārūpāvacaresupi ayaṁnayo netabbo”ti. Rūpe bhavo rūpaṁ. Rūpataṇhā. Arūpe bhavo
anya-e0401n0:74_4: arūpaṁ, arūpataṇhā. Rūpassa avacaraṁ rūpāvacaraṁ. Arūpassa avacaraṁ arūpāvacaranti
anya-e0401n0:74_5: imamatthaṁ dīpeti “tesu panā”tiādinā. “Atrā”ti imasmiṁ ṭhāne. Yadipi lobho, rāgo,
anya-e0401n0:74_6: kāmo, taṇhā, tisabbampetaṁ lobhassavevacanaṁ hoti. Rūparāgo arūparāgoti pana visuṁ
anya-e0401n0:74_7: vibhattattā idha kāmasaddena taṁ daññolobho gayhati. “Sabbopi lobho”ti etenasassatuccheda
anya-e0401n0:75_0: 19. “Rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhā”ti animittā hutvā niruḷhāti adhippāyo. Idāni
anya-e0401n0:75_1: sanimittaṁ nayaṁ vadati “apicā”tiādinā. “Nissayopacāro”ti ṭhānūpacāro, yathā sabbogāmo
anya-e0401n0:75_2: āgatoti. “Nissito pacāro”ti ṭhānyūpacāro. Yathā dhajā āgacchantīti. “Yaṁ etasmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:75_3: antare”ti ye etasmiṁ antare khandhadhātu āyatanā. Yaṁ rūpaṁ, yā vedanā, yāsaññā,
anya-e0401n0:75_4: ye saṅkhārā, yaṁviññāṇanti yojanā. “Suvisada”nti yebhūyyādi nayehi anākulattāsuvisuddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:76_4: Nibbānaṁ pana idha na labbhati cittasaṅgahādhikārattāti adhippāyo. So ca apariyāpannabhāvo,
anya-e0401n0:78_1: pāpadhammehi yuttattā sabba cittehi hīnataraṁ. “Tadattho”ti uparimānaṁ cittānaṁ sobhaṇasaññākaraṇasukhattho.
anya-e0401n0:78_2: “Ādito”tiādimhi. “Vīthicittavasenāti etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti evaṁ pavattassa
anya-e0401n0:78_3: bhavanikanti javanavīthicittassa vasena. Evañcasati, kiṁ kāraṇaṁ lobhamūlacittassapathamaṁ
anya-e0401n0:78_4: vacaneti āha “akusalesu panā”tiādiṁ.“Dvīhivaṭṭamūlehī”ti lobhamohasaṅkhātehi dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi.
anya-e0401n0:79_1: vutte kāyikasukhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṁ “mānasika…pe… nāma”nti. “Sumanābhidhānassā”ti
anya-e0401n0:79_2: sumananāmassa. “Pavattinimitta”nti pavattiyā āsanna kāraṇaṁ. Kathaṁ pana bhāvo pavattinimittaṁ
anya-e0401n0:79_3: nāmahotīti āha “bhavanti…pe… katvā”ti. Nimitte bhummaṁ. Tathāhi bhāvo nāma saddappavattinimittanti
anya-e0401n0:79_4: vuttaṁ. Idāni nimitta lakkhaṇaṁ dassento “yathāhī”tiādimāha. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṁ payoge.
anya-e0401n0:79_5: “Danta nimitta”nti dantakāraṇā. “Taṁ vedanā nimitta”nti taṁ vedanākāraṇā. Ettha siyā,
anya-e0401n0:79_6: “etasminti nimitte bhumma”nti vuttaṁ, nimittañcanāma akārakaṁ asādhanaṁ, taṁ kathaṁ
anya-e0401n0:79_7: sādhanaviggahe yujjatīti. Adhikaraṇa sādhanānurūpattā saddappavattinimittassāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:79_8: Etenāti ca etasmāti ca hetu atthe ubhayavacananti vadanti. Āsannahetu nāmasādhanarūpo
anya-e0401n0:79_9: bhavatīti tesaṁ adhippāyo. Suṭṭhu karoti, pakatipaccayena anipphannaṁ kammaṁ attano
anya-e0401n0:79_10: balena nipphādetīti saṅkhāro. “Pubbābhisaṅkhāro”ti pubbabhāge abhisaṅkhāro. Payojeti
anya-e0401n0:79_11: niyojetīti payogo. Upeti phalasaṅkhāto attho etenāti upāyo. “Āṇattiyāvā”ti pesanāyavā.
anya-e0401n0:79_12: “Ajjhesanena vā”ti āyācanena vā. “Tajjetvā vā”ti bhayaṁ dassetvā vā. “Taṁ taṁ upāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:79_13: pare ācikkha”nti. Kathaṁ ācikkhantīti āha “akaraṇe”tiādiṁ. “Tasmiṁ tasmiṁ kamme payojetītikatvā
anya-e0401n0:79_14: idha saṅkhāro nāmā”ti yojanā. “Paccaya gaṇo”ti pakatipaccayagaṇo. “Tenā”ti saṅkhārena.
anya-e0401n0:79_16: vā upāyena vā. “Yo pana tenasahito”tiādinā pubbevuttamevatthaṁ pakārantarenapākaṭaṁ
anya-e0401n0:79_18: paccayagaṇasseva visesa nāmanti vuttaṁ hoti. Uppannatthe ikapaccayoti kathaṁ viññāyatīti
anya-e0401n0:79_20: iccevattho. Sabbametaṁ nayujjatiyeva. Kasmā, pāḷiaṭṭhakathāhi asaṁsandanattā, atthayuttibyañjanayuttīnañca
anya-e0401n0:79_24: Etenapaṭikkhittā hotīti sambandho. Gāthāyaṁ. “Cittasambhavī”ti cittasmiṁ sambhūto.
anya-e0401n0:79_25: Viseso saṅkhāro nāmāti yojanā. Salomako, sapakkhakotyādīsuviyāti vuttaṁ. Sāsavā dhammā,
anya-e0401n0:79_26: sārammaṇā dhammātyādīsuviyāti pana vutte yuttataraṁ. “Pāḷiaṭṭhakathā siddha”nti pāḷiaṭṭhakathāto
anya-e0401n0:79_27: siddhaṁ. Apicayatthavisuddhimaggādīsu asaṅkhāraṁ cittaṁ, sasaṅkhāraṁ cittanti āgataṁ.
anya-e0401n0:79_28: Tattha ayaṁ pacchimanayo yutto. Upāyasamuṭṭhitassa anekasatasambhavato “idañca nayadassanamevā”ti
